description: Ossian is a characteristically delicious beer from Inveralmond Brewery. A flavour-packed base of slow kilned ale malt, caramalt and biscuity malted wheat ensures a strong, rich body. Zesty First Gold, Cascade and Fuggles hops then cut through that richness. The result is a skilfully balanced award winning golden ale.
name: OSSIAN

description: Ossian is flavour packed with slow kilned ale malt, caramalt and biscuit malted wheat to craft a malt backbone which is then beautifully complemented by a heady hop aroma of zesty hop & orange citrus. This golden ale finishes refreshing and moreish.
name: Ossian Golden Ale

description: A Premium, sessionable Scottish Ale, served Thirst-Quenchingly cold. The zesty Lemon and Orange citrus notes, cut through the light malty flavours beutifully. Charged with Nitrogen to create a creamy, silky mouthfeel. One pint will leave the sense asking for more.
name: Ossian Smoothflow, Keg

description: Pacifico, a pilsener type beer, dates back to the beginning of 1900’s. Since 1985, Pacífico has been exported mainly to the West Coast of USA, where it has gained strong recognition. A brilliant pale gold, slightly hoppy, full of flavour brew.
name: Pacifico Clara, NRB

description: This will delight if you’re a fan of fruity, crisp beers. Pale in colour but robust in flavour and very refreshing. Expect a large fruit juice aroma with lime, grapefruit and a hint of spiciness. A delicate blend of mango, passion fruit and pineapple flavours, combined with a light, crisp refreshing body, finishing with a smooth caramel aftertaste.
name: Paradiso Citra IPA (Big Drop), NRB

description: Peroni Gran Riserva is a pure 100% Italian malt brand, brewed using the best two-row spring barley varieties. Created to celebrate the 150th anniversary of the brewery foundation, it is one of the highest quality beers of Birra Peroni's portfolio. An intense gold colour, it combines a fine taste of malt and caramel and a delicate fruity aroma.
name: Peroni Gran Riserva, NRB

description: Containing the same high quality ingredients and production process of Peroni Nastro Azzurro, with the gluten removed. Peroni Nastro Azzurro Gluten Free delivers the same delicate balance of bitterness and citrus aromatic notes combined with the refreshing, clean finish of Peroni Nastro Azzurro.	This beer is certified gluten free.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro (Gluten Free)

description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% is brewed using the creativity and flair of Italians. Blending the finest hops with two-row spring planted barley and a quarter of Italian maize results in a beer with a uniquely crisp and refreshing taste.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0%, NRB

description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro is brewed using the creativity and flair of Italians. Blending the finest hops with two-row spring planted barley and a quarter of Italian maize results in a beer with a uniquely crisp and refreshing taste.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 5%, Can

description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro is brewed using the creativity and flair of Italians. Blending the finest hops with two-row spring planted barley and a quarter of Italian maize results in a beer with a uniquely crisp and refreshing taste.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 5%, Keg

description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro is brewed using the creativity and flair of Italians. Blending the finest hops with two-row spring planted barley and a quarter of Italian maize results in a beer with a uniquely crisp and refreshing taste.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 5%, Keg

name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 5%, NRB

description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro is brewed using the creativity and flair of Italians. Blending the finest hops with two-row spring planted barley and a quarter of Italian maize results in a beer with a uniquely crisp and refreshing taste.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 5%, NRB

description: Peroni Nastro Azzurro gluten-free is brewed using the creativity and flair of Italians. A beer with a uniquely crisp and refreshing taste.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro Gluten-Free 5%, NRB

description: Since 1963 Peroni Nastro Azzurro has been brewed in Italy with craftsmanship, passion and flair creating a balance of bitterness and citrus aromatic notes with a crisp, dry finish.
name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro, NRB

description: Peroni Red has been produced in Italy with care, competence and passion since 1846, always following the original recipe and using the best ingredients. The great taste, clean aftertaste and inimitable freshness provide the satisfaction and the pleasure that comes from a great Italian beer.
name: Peroni Red, NRB

description: In 1842 the world's first golden pilsner was created in Plzen. Pilsner Urquell beer is made in the same way, in the same place, with 100% of our ingredients from the same farming regions in the Czech Republic. A perfect balance of fuller flavours, caramel sweetness, pleasing bitterness and a stunning clean finish.
name: Pilsner Urquell

description: In 1842 the world's first golden pilsner was created in Plzen. Pilsner Urquell beer is made in the same way, in the same place, with 100% of our ingredients from the same farming regions in the Czech Republic. A perfect balance of fuller flavours, caramel sweetness, pleasing bitterness and a stunning clean finish.
name: Pilsner Urquell, Keg

description: This dry-hopped pale ale is deliciously refreshing. The nose has hints of pine and honey. Packed full of flavour from citrus-heavy hops with a twist of fresh lime to create a crisp, zesty beer.
name: Pine Trail Pale Ale (Big Drop), Can

description: This dry-hopped pale ale is deliciously refreshing. The nose has hints of pine and honey. Packed full of flavour from citrus-heavy hops with a twist of fresh lime to create a crisp, zesty beer.
name: Pine Trail Pale Ale (Big Drop), NRB

description: Pistonhead was crafted in the fantastically named "Brutal Brewery Workshop" where brew masters and marketing professionals worked together to create and establish an innovative, no- nonsense approach to creating the brand. Water, barley malt and loaded with hops to give it just the right finish.
name: Pistonhead, Can

description: The best quality imported German Pilsner malt and our own blend of German and Czech Saaz hops contribute to a beautifully rounded craft lager which manages to be both refreshing and satisfying.
name: Portobello London Pilsner

description: Imported German Pilsner malt and our own blend of German Gold and Czech Saaz hops contribute to a beautifully rounded lager which manages to be both refreshing and satisfying. Long cold fermentation and maturation is essential to achieve the perfect continental flavour - but craft brewed in London!
name: Portobello London Pilsner, Keg

description: Tropical Crush is an IPA made with whole fruits sourced from London's Portobello Market. We brew a stiff, well hopped IPA using Simcoe and Southern Cross hops and augment it with Mango & Passionfruit. The result is juicy and fresh, with a bitter hop backbone keeping everything in check. Drink chilled all year round.
name: Portobello Tropical Crush IPA 4.4%, NRB

description: This crisp golden pale ale is brewed from Maris Otter Pale Ale and Caragold  Malts. Complex late hop additions give a citrus fruit finishing together with a smooth refreshing palate. Served chilled with spicy dishes or enjoy on its own.
name: Portobello Westways Pale Ale

description: Pravha is a premium lager that has all the iconic flavour and gentle bitterness of a high quality Czech Pilsner, but is unexpectedly crisp, light and refreshing. This pale gold pilsner hits the senses with light fresh malt sweetness on the palate, quickly cleared with a balanced light hop that lingers long enough to invite the next mouthful.
name: Pravha Keg

description: A worlds first, award winning, caffeine infused lager. Following 3 years of development we bring you an expertly brewed light, crisp and refreshing lager with an edge. Attractive delicate nose with zesty citrus aromatics and gently malty notes. GF and Vegan. Serve Chilled (4.2% ABV)
name: Prime Time Caffeine Lager NRB

description: An award winning, perfectly balanced, full flavoured and full strength lager expertly brewed with 30% fewer calories. Light, crisp, refreshing. Enticing nose with appealing bitternes, gently hoppy, touch of orange and malt with an attractive genty fruitiness on the palate finishing with a subtle citrus hit. GF and Vegan. Serve chilled (4.2% ABV)
name: Prime Time Classic Lager Keg

description: An award winning, perfectly balanced, full flavoured and full strength lager expertly brewed with 30% fewer calories. Light, crisp, refreshing. Enticing nose with appealing bitterness, gently hoppy, touch of orange and malt with an attractive genty fruitiness on the palate finishing with a subtle citrus hit. GF and Vegan. Serve Chilled (4.2% ABV)
name: Prime Time Classic Lager Nrb

description: This light, golden classic has been subverted with new world hops to create an explosion of flavour. Bursts of caramel and tropical fruit with an all-out riot of grapefruit, pineapple and lychee, precede a spiky bitter finish.
name: Punk IPA 5.2%, Keg

description: Winner of the World’s Best Pale Lager at the 2015 World Beer Awards. Lawless is brewed with a big dose of El Dorado hops, unfiltered and unpasteurised then carefully matured for 40 days to deliver a smooth full flavour and a refreshing citrus kick.
name: Purity Brewing Lawless Lager, Keg

description: A distinctive, full bodied rye IPA, brewed to perfection with plenty of character. Refreshing and unfiltered.
name: Purity Brewing Longhorn IPA, Can

description: Award winning Pure UBU is a well-balanced, full flavoured amber ale, named after our faithful canine friend. Pure UBU is brewed with the perfect combination of Marris Otter, Crystal, Black and Wheat Malts for true depth of flavour. This excellent ale is hopped with Cascade and Pilgrim varieties for bright aromas and balanced bitterness.
name: Purity Brewing Pure UBU, NRB

description: Session IPA is moreish and unflitered, brimming with tropical fruit notes and hop aromas. Vegan friendly and gluten free.
name: Purity Brewing Session IPA, Keg

description: A distinctive, full bodied rye IPA, brewed to perfection with plenty of character. Refreshing and unfiltered.
name: Purity Longhorn IPA, Keg

description: Argentina’s favourite beer comes from the capital, Buenos Aires. It is a 4.9% lager style beer with a very distinguishable taste that is very well known to the South American community.
name: Quilmes, NRB

description: The icon that is Red Stripe is unique. Its crisp grain store character and subtle citrus notes make it stand out from the crowd as it carnivals across your tongue.
name: Red Stripe, can

description: The icon that is Red Stripe is unique. Its crisp grain store character and subtle citrus notes make it stand out from the crowd as it carnivals across your tongue.
name: Red Stripe, Keg (Sankey Coupler)

description: A light beer with a distinctive husky cereal note and undertones of fruit
name: Red Stripe, NRB

description: A true to style American Pale Ale that's tropical, resinous, piny, and exploding with fruity hop character, while remaining balanced and drinkable.
name: Redchurch Bethnal Pale Ale, NRB

description: Our modern American Pale Ale. A mix of fresh floral bouquet and tropical fruit aroma produced by a big blend of American hops. Citrus zing on the front of the pallette folowed by passion fruit notes. Medium body with a refershing bitterness and dry finish.
name: Redchurch Brewery Bethnal Pale, Keg

description: An Indian Pale Ale with a full body, orange and citrus fruit flavours. The blend of Amercian and New Zealand hops gives the beer a balanced bitterness with a citrus and tropical aroma and notes of mango. Complex flavours with hints of grapefruit and matue fruits highlight a full finish.
name: Redchurch Great Eastern, Keg

description: It is the reinterpretation of a traditional stout define by us as a modern London stout. On the nose we have hints of toasted bread, coffee and chocolate. A dry blend of American hops balances the structured body giving a plesant freshness on average bitterness.
name: Redchurch Hoxton Stout, Keg

description: Characteristic hints of British malt with a grassy aroma given by an accurate blend of American and German hops. The malty taste provides honey notes but leaves room for a dry finish. Thirst quenching.
name: Redchurch Lager, Keg

description: The work horse of any modern craft brewery, the session IPA. The low alcohol content is supported by a detailed malt base with oats added for a complexed texture. The bouquet is explosive with strong hints of lime and ripe fruit given by a massive use of American and New Zeland hops.
name: Redchurch Paradise Pale, Keg

description: Our Belgian-inspired blonde beer and our breaking point with the Anglo/American tradition. Belgian yeast and German hops give this beer a spicy and fruit aroma with banana and ripe fruit. The best English pale malt blends with addition of oats and wheat giving a dry and tasty body. Think sunshine in a glass.
name: Redchurch Shoreditch Blonde, Keg

description: Using 100% UK ingredients, this Pilsner-style lager is crisp, clean and utterly refreshing.
name: Renegade Lager

description: Using 100% UK ingredients, this Pilsner-style lager is crisp, clean and utterly refreshing.
name: Renegade Lager, Keg

description: Crafted with Lager Malt and a hop blend of German Hallertau Magnum & Tradition, Slovenian Styrian and dry hopped with British Admiral & Boadicea varieties to deliver a refreshing easy drinking beer with a subtle citrus orange marmalade flavour.
name: Revisionist Craft English Lager, Keg

description: A golden full-bodied malted beer, named after the 1849 gold rush. Fortyniner has a rounded malt in the mouth with strong hop balance and a deep bittersweet finish.
name: Ringwood Fortyniner, cask

description: Tired of the tasteless Chilean beer industry, the Rothhammer brothers decided to brew their first beer, Real Golden Ale. They dreamt of delivering quality and honesty, and used basic equipment and their Dad’s empty pool for a plant. Real Golden Ale is a flavour packed Ale with fruity aromas and notes of caramel. This is Soul Crafted Chilean Beer
name: Rothhammer Golden Ale, Keg

description: The epitome of Chilean refreshment! It is inspired by the Nazca tectonic plate, which creates the Andes mountains that shapes the unique Chilean environment. It has an enticing aroma of citrus and Honey and a long hop finish. “This is about putting our soul and talent into every pint and bottle. We brew Soul Crafted Chilean Beers.”- M Rothhammer
name: Rothhammer Nazca IPA, Keg

description: The 1st Chilean craft beer to be imported into Europe, Rothhammer Brave Red Ale has been brewed to challenge your senses and shake your perceptions. An abundance of Mosaic hops are used for an intense aroma and flavour. Rothhammer - Soul Crafted Chilean Beer.
name: Rothhammer Red Ale, Keg

description: When they aren’t brewing you will find the Rothhammer brothers on the snowy mountain slopes or in the skate park. They love snowboarding and are thankful for the Stratus clouds that deliver fresh powder to ride on. Stratus has a subtle hop character, and a crisp, clean palate, with a dry finish.
name: Rothhammer Stratus lager, Keg

description: This is an English ale with hoppy, citrus undertones balanced with bitterness and a light sweetness. It has an aroma that is packed with soft fruit notes and a clean, moreish finish. Available in cask, smooth and sparkling.
name: Ruddles Best, Cask

description: A crisp refreshing pale lager that balances the soft smooth bitterness of British hops with the uplifting pine and cirtus notes of American Cascade.
name: Sadlers Peaky Blinder Lager, Keg

description: Moderately rich and has a dry and pleasantly bitter taste
name: Sagres Branca, Keg

description: Sagres has a dry clean palate and subtle fruity, malty and hoppy notes. It is slightly more bitter than what you'd expect for a lager from a warmer climate like Portugal.
name: Sagres, NRB

description: This hybrid beer has a dynamic flavour of an ale with the balance drinkability and smoothness of a lager. It is a high quality crafted golden beer that is perfect for occasions that call for a lighter more drinkable style.
name: Sam 76, KEG

description: A full-flavoured and balanced lager with a balance of malty sweetness contrasted by hop spiciness and followed by a robust, smooth finish.
name: Sam Adams

description: A full-flavoured and balanced lager with a balance of malty sweetness contrasted by hop spiciness and followed by a robust, smooth finish.
name: Samuel Adams, Keg, 50 lt

description: Brewed with only the finest ingredients including Bavarian Noble hops and traditional brewing methods, Samuel Adams Boston Lager is full-flavoured and balanced. The balance of malty sweetness contrasted by hop spiciness and followed by the robust, smooth finish sets the standard for all Samuel Adams beers
name: Samuel Adams, Keg

description: San Miguel is brewed using special mashing process which gives the beer a fuller and slightly sweeter flavour. The unique recipe and San Miguel yeast then come together to deliver a refreshing, full bodied beer with a great taste. San Miguel is a pilsner sytle lager, golden in colour, sparkling with a generous white creamy head.
name: San Miguel Draughtmaster, Keg

description: A slow drinking, 5.0% Spanish lager, designed to be savoured.
name: San Miguel, keg

description: A slow drinking, 5.0% Spanish lager, designed to be savoured.
name: San Miguel, NRB

description: The world's first graefruit hefeweizen beer. A radler with refreshing well-rounded taste with hints of fruity sweetness and a zest of grapefruit notes.
name: Schofferhofer Grapefruit, Can

description: The world's first grapefruit hefeweizen beer. A radler with refreshing well-rounded taste with hints of fruity sweetness and a zest of grapefruit notes.
name: Schöfferhofer Grapefruit, Keg

description: A clean, pale, refreshing Pilsner style lager with noble Saaz hops delivering floral, spicy and herbal charachteriscics true to the Pilsner tradition. An addition of Hallertau Blanc hops adds a modern element, delivering subtle tropical fruit notes that put a twist on a classic.
name: Seven Bro7hers Pilsner, Can

description: A clean, pale, refreshing Pilsner style lager with noble Saaz hops delivering floral, spicy and herbal charachteristics true to the Pilsner tradition. An addition of Hallertau Blanc hops adds a modern element, delivering subtle tropical fruit notes that put a twist on a classic.
name: Seven Bro7hers Pilsner, Keg

description: A real crowd favourite! A wheat beer, with fresh-pressed organic watermelon and a massive late hop addition, results in a truly thirst-quenching craft beer.
name: Seven Bro7hers Watermelon Wheat Beer, Keg

description: A punchy pilsner lager topped with a splash of crisp elderflower pressé. Tastes like chilling on a sun-drenched bench.
name: Shandy Shack Elderflower Lager Top, Keg

description: A hop-packed IPA with a slosh of natural lemonade. Tastes like summers on the village green.
name: Shandy Shack IPA Shandy, Can

description: A hop-packed IPA with a slosh of natural lemonade. Tastes like summers on the village green.
name: Shandy Shack IPA Shandy, Keg

description: A balanced aroma of spicy resinous hop, sweet malt and delicate roasted notes. Perfectly balanced on the palate with a blend of dried fruit, lightly roasted malty notes and a subtle yet assertive bitterness.
name: Sharp's Doom Bar

description: Named after the infamous sand bank on Cornwall's Altlantic coarst, Doom Bar has a distinctive aroma and balanced moreish flavour. These qualities have underpinned its rapid growth to become the UK's No.1 cask ale.
name: Sharps Doom Bar, cask

description: Inspired by those rare moments when the wind turns offshore to create perfectly clean waves and that feeling of cool, refreshing sea spray on your face. We decided to try and put that feeling in a can. Well. not the sea spray, more the Czech yeast and continental hops that create this refreshing pilsner that’s as satisfying as that perfect wave
name: Sharps Offshore Lager, Keg

description: Inspired by those rare moments when the wind turns offshore to create perfectly clean waves and that feeling of cool, refreshing sea spray on your face. We decided to try and put that feeling in a can. Well. not the sea spray, more the Czech yeast and continental hops that create this refreshing pilsner that’s as satisfying as that perfect wave
name: Sharps Offshore Pilsner Lager, Can

description: Dry hopped with Cascade and Citra to give a distinct and inviting hop aroma. Refreshing and easy to drink but with a perfect balance of bitterness and tropical fruit aromas.
name: Shed Head DMM

description: Shed Head - An American Pale Ale, brewed at The Backyard Brewery at Falkenberg, Sweden. Dry hopped with Cascade and Citra to give a distinct and inviting hop aroma. Refreshing and easy to drink but with a perfect balance of bitterness and tropical fruit aromas
name: Shed Head, Keg

description: Created to celebrate Sheppy’s bicentenary, history and location near the town of Wellington, taking its name from the great Iron Duke and his victory at the battle of Waterloo. A fine crafted medium sweet cider, made with a blend of traditional cider apples pressed & matured on the farm. Creating this full flavoured cider with rich apple aromas.
name: Sheppy's 200 Special Edition Cider, Keg

description: ShinDigger Session blended with mango and pineapple. Imagine if Rubicon made beer...
name: ShinDigger Mango Unchained, Can

description: ShinDigger Session blended with mango and pineapple. Imagine if Rubicon made beer..
name: ShinDigger Mango Unchained, Keg

description: Clean and crisp pale with a burst of orange from the lead hop Amarillo. West Coast Pale is our homage to the West Coast styles that dawned a new era in world brewing and inspired us to start brewing.
name: ShinDigger West Coast Pale, Keg

description: An easy drinking, American style Pale Ale bursting with fruity citrus hop aroma and flavour. Dry hopped with 4x American hops Chinook, Cascade, Centennial and Columbus - Drop anchor for a spell and try a great tasting beer.
name: Shipyard American Pale Ale, Keg

description: A juicy, tropical Pale Ale, with a fullness that belies its low alcohol. Generous quantities of hops are added throughout the brewing process and it is those hops that deliver Low Tide’s richly fruity hop character, with tropical fruits, and notes of subtle citrus and blueberry.
name: Shipyard Low Tide, NRB

description: Bearface is brewed in the style of the great European Pilsners that sparked the growth of the most popular beer style in the world. Unabashedly inspired by snappy Czech lagers, this bright, brazen lager takes its name from its transparent heritage, as well as its distinctive bite...
name: Shred, Can

description: This californian beer has a deep amber colour and an exceptionally full-bodied, complex character. Generous quantaties of premium Cascade hops give Sierra Nevada Pale Ale its fragrant bouquet and spicy flavours. A great match for food with strong flavours such as spicy pulled pork or Thai curry.
name: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale, Keg

description: Clean, golden, pilsner style lager. Fresh, zesty and easy drinking.
name: Singha Lager, Keg

description: Bottled and brewed in Thailand, Singha is the authentic Thai beer and is the no. 1 selling Thai beer in the UK.
name: Singha, NRB

description: From their Brewery in South East London, the Small Beer team specialise exclusively in brewing classic beers styles below 2.8% ABV. Exceptional quality & world class flavour at the lower ABV is what we do. What's more they do it responsibly - becoming London's first B Corp certified Brewery in 2019. All coffee, toast and dark chocolate. Nosing like a stout or porter, this dark lager leaves a lightly roasted toasty finish.
name: Small Beer Dark Lager 1.0% ABV

description: From their Brewery in South East London, the Small Beer team specialise exclusively in brewing classic beers styles below 2.8% ABV. Exceptional quality & world class flavour at the lower ABV is what we do. What's more they do it responsibly - becoming London's first B Corp certified Brewery in 2019. A classic Pilsner-style lager (lagered out for six weeks) shows a citrus nose, stone fruit palate and a continental bite on the finish. Bright, crisp and fresh!
name: Small Beer Lager 2.1% ABV

description: From their Brewery in South East London, the Small Beer team specialise exclusively in brewing classic beers styles below 2.8% ABV. Exceptional quality & world class flavour at the lower ABV is what we do. What's more they do it responsibly - becoming London's first B Corp certified Brewery in 2019. A truly sessionable pale ale packed with tropical fruit aromas that deliver a mouthwateringly juicy taste.
name: Small Beer Session Pale 2.5% ABV

description: Pure refreshment with a perfect balance of citrus, malt and hints of hops and barley with a wonderfully fresh aroma.
name: Smashed Citrus Beer - Alcohol Free

description: A refreshing pale gold lager beer with a clean taste.Perfectly balanced with hints of barley and malt, complex aromatic floral notes and a mild hoppy bitterness. Forget boring Alcohol Free, this is refreshing Alcohol Free.
name: Smashed Lager - Alcohol Free, NRB

description: A light refreshing pale ale that's a fusion of traditional and modern. A pale copper sparkling beer with hints of caramel and toffee. Finished with a modern American style hop for a tropical passion fruit aroma.
name: Smashed Pale Ale - Alcohol Free

description: Sol is a fresh and crisp lager with some hoppy and fruity notes finished with moderate bitterness.
name: Sol, NRB

description: Session style smooth flow ale. Amber in colour with a fruity aroma and light sweet flavour with notes of caramel and fruit.
name: Southampton Ale 76, Keg

description: Session style smooth flow ale. Amber in colour with a fruity aroma and light sweet flavour with notes of caramel and fruit.
name: Southampton Ale 76, NRB

description: Boasts over 600 years of German brewing heritage Full-bodied with a crisp graininess, a faint citrus finish and a lingering dryness Brewed according to the German purity laws, Spaten Helles is one of Munich’s best loved beers.
name: Spaten Helles, Keg

description: Softly bitter with a deep fruity tang, this classic well-rounded Kentish Ale ornaments mellow malt with with a trio of aromatic english hop varieties all sprung from the garden of England.
name: Spitfire Kentish Ale, Cask

description: Style - Indian Pale Ale See - Golden Taste - Pine Resin, Grapefruit Bitter - 4* Sweet - 2.5* Malt - Maris Otter Hops - Willamette,Cascade,Chinook Food Match - BBQs, spicy food.
name: St Austell Proper Job, Cask

description: Voted as one of the UK's top ten premium cask ales. Tribute is a delicious full-bodied malty beer with a rich aroma of biscuity malt and tart citrus fruit.
name: St Austell Tribute, cask

description: The well balanced, full bodied, highly drinkable and pleasantly smooth taste of our Staropramen offers a rewarding pleasure of the genuine Czech beer. A distinctive rich, floral aroma and malty taste with a quenching, bitter finish.

description: Stella Artois was first brewed as a Christmas beer in leuven. It was named Stella from the star of Christmas, and Artois after Sebastian Artois, founder of the brewery. It's brewed to perfection using the original Stella Artois yeast and the celebrated Saaz hops. It's the optimum premium lager, with it's full flavour and clean crisp taste.
name: Stella Artois 4.6%, Keg (Scotland Only)

description: Stella Artois was first brewed as a Christmas beer in leuven. It was named Stella from the star of Christmas, and Artois after Sebastian Artois, founder of the brewery. The absence of filtration allows the fresh flavours of malt and hops to burst through for a naturally flavourful taste.

name: Stewart Ka Pai Hopped Pale Ale

description: Younger's Tartan Special is a genuine Scottish ale with a full bodied, sweet and satisfying roast flavour ABV 3.7%.
name: Tartan Special, keg

description: A 4.2% Bitter brewed in Scotland.
name: Tennent's 80/- Ember, keg

description: Tennent's Lager has been the market leader in Scotland since it was first brewed in 1885 at Wellpark Brewery, Glasgow. It is a distinctive, well-balanced lager whose sweet, malty flavours combine with a tangy hoppiness to create its crisp, refreshing character.

description: A 3.5% Bitter brewed in Scotland.

description: A 3.5% Bitter brewed in Scotland.

description: T Zero has an obvious malt/grain aroma, with a touch of fruit/ester present on the nose. One can also detect other characters associated with cereal grains. There is a sweetness from the grain and an almost balancing bitterness from the hops. T Zero has a lingering after bitterness progressing to a slight astringency. This beer is low bodied
name: Tennents Zero, NRB

description: Rich and dark with more than a hint of roasted malts and caramel flavours. A wonderful balance of hop bitterness and aroma, all captured in the one glass.
name: Tetley Dark Mild

description: Velvety hints of rich buttered malt loaf and chilled horlicks are intensified by liquorice and nutty toffee amidst a basket of fruity flavours.
name: Tetley Mild, keg

description: Tetley's Smoothflow is a smoothflow ale first brewed in Leeds in 1822, light and easy drinking with a creamy caramel bitter sweetness balanced with a pleasant hoppiness and a soft caramel finish.
name: Tetley Smoothflow Bitter, keg

description: Velvety hints of rich buttered malt loaf and chilled horlicks are intensified by liquorice and nutty toffee amidst a basket of fruity flavours.
name: Tetley Traditional Bitter, cask

description: A quintessential English bitter, full bodied and one of the oldest ales in Yorkshire.
name: Theakstons Best Bitter Cask

description: Real root ginger is matured in our cider, before being hand-pressed to create a well-balanced, medium-sweet cider, which should unite ginger lovers the world over. The cider is a bright, golden colour, with the aroma of freshly grated ginger. Ginger compliments the fresh apples; refreshing in the summer and warming in the winner!
name: Thistly Cross Ginger

description: As its name suggests, Tiger packs a real bite. A premium lager with some cereal character on aroma. Fruity notes are balanced with moderate bitterness and clean finish.
name: Tiger Beer, NRB

description: A premium lager with some cereal character on aroma. Fruity notes are blanced with moderate bitterness and a clean finish.
name: Tiger Blade, Keg

description: As its name suggests, Tiger packs a real bite. A premium lager with some cereal character on aroma. Fruity notes are balanced with moderate bitterness and clean finish.
name: Tiger, Keg, 30 Lt

description: A classic strong pale ale, Landlord has won more awards nationally than any other beer. It is refreshingly reliable with a complex and hoppy aroma.
name: Tim Taylors Landlord, cask

description: A mature beer with a powerful fruit aroma - sweet and fruity each flavour with with just a hint of bitterness from the peach skin and kernel.
name: Timmermans Peche

description: Boltmaker, the 2014 CAMRA Supreme Champion Beer of Britain is a well-balanced, genuine Yorkshire cask beer with a full measure of maltiness and a hoppy aroma.
name: Timothy Taylor Boltmaker Cask

description: Ripe citrus fruits and a piney bitterness result in a marmalade-like flavour, with medium bitterness.
name: Tiny Rebel Cali, Can

description: The UKs No.1 Tropical IPA. This is what happens when you slice pineapples, squeeze mangos, crush peaches and pummel passionfruit into an IPA.
name: Tiny Rebel Clwb Tropica

description: This grown up fruit salad is super juicy and crammed full of fruity hop flavours that will have your mouth watering. Packed full of American hops, amplified by Peach, Passionfruit, Pineapple and Mango flavours!
name: Tiny Rebel Clwb Tropicana, Can

description: Unfiltered. Hazy. Murky. Clean it ain’t, but that’s no bad thing. In fact it’s very, very good. We’ve retained more flavour and a silky smooth texture in this Vermont style IPA, and made sure it’s one you can enjoy time and time again by keeping the ABV nice and low. A mild bitterness and a big juicy blast, refresh with Dutty!
name: Tiny Rebel Dutty, Keg

description: Smell of citrus, a tropical taste and perfectly smooth finish.
name: Tiny Rebel Easy Livin', Can

description: smell of citrus, a tropical taste and perfectly smooth finish.
name: Tiny Rebel Easy Livin', Keg

description: This marshmallow porter has the classic roasty qualities of a proper dark ale, whilst the marshmallow gives it a smooth sweetness, both combining for a delightful, S’mores-like ale. A sweet treat for the cold winter nights.
name: Tiny Rebel Stay Puft, Can

description: Crafted from fresh surplus bread, malted grain and only the finest hops. Golden with a smooth finish and a hint of caramel and citrus. Best served chilled. The bread replaces 1/3 of the barley. It Is brewed rather than wasted. All profits are poured into the charity Feedback to end food waste. Making Toast Ale the best thing since...well, you know.
name: Toast Ale Pale Ale

description: Crafted from fresh surplus bread, malted grain and Perle and Hallertau hops that deliver a refeshing bitterness. Best served chilled. The bread replaces 1/3 of the barley. It Is brewed rather than wasted. All profits are poured into the charity Feedback to end food waste. Making Toast Ale the best thing since...well, you know
name: Toast Craft Lager

description: Tropical. Zesty. Planet-Saving. Food production is the biggest contributor to climate change, but one third of all food is wasted. We're here to change that. Our American Pale Ale is brewed with surplus fresh bread, malted barley and Simcoe, Citra and Ekuanot hops. A fruity, refreshing American Pale Ale.
name: Toast Planet-Saving American Pale Ale, NRB

description: Crafted from fresh surplus bread, malted grain and hops that deliver a well rounded bitterness with citrus and floral notes. Best served chilled. The bread replaces 1/3 of the barley. It Is brewed rather than wasted. All profits are poured into the charity Feedback to end food waste. Making Toast Ale the best thing since...well, you know
name: Toast Session IPA

description: Tsingtao Lager has a crisp, slightly malty flavor and nutty sweet taste which complements spicy or flavourful Asian cuisine.
name: Tsing Tao, NRB

description: Tuborg Green is a bottom-fermented lager brewed on a lager malt, with mild and fresh taste as well as the aroma of flowers and grain. It is medium rich and lively with a moderate bitterness in the aftertaste.
name: Tuborg, keg

description: This APA is brewed to bring you a face full of classic American flavour! Cascade and amarillo in the kettle meet citra and its lil' bro comet in the dry hop to produce an intensely hoppy beer. Grapefruits, pine needles, limes & oranges are thrown around the place when this circus rolls in to town.
name: Two Tribes Electric Circus American Pale Ale, Can

description: the number one beer brand in Poland, is a 5.0% lager characterised by its balanced sweet/bitter taste, low carbonation and a pleasant aroma of hops, caramel and a hint of fruit, characterised by its balanced sweet/bitter taste, low carbonation and a pleasant aroma of hops, caramel and a hint of fruit.
name: Tyskie Gronie, NRB

description: Aromas of cracker, light honey and pepper this lager is crisp, balanced with a suitable level of bitterness to ensure it has a dry refreshing bite.
name: Uptime Craft Lager (Big Drop), NRB

description: Vedett Extra White has a refreshing taste that is surprisingly crisp and punctuated with an orange and lemon like zest, rounded with a mildly bitter taste and dry finish. Only natural ingredients such as wheat, hops, coriander and dried orange peel are used in the brewing.
name: Vedett Extra White

description: Vedett IPA has mild bitterness which increases in intensity, revealing hints of grapefruit in the finish before giving rise to sweeter caramel notes. Vedett IPA has a superb finish with a long-lasting, dry aftertaste that continues to tantalise the taste buds.
name: Vedett IPA

description: Victoria is a refreshing beer with a balanced body and taste, perfect for drinking at any time of day. It is a light, golden colour and has a fine, sparkling, white head.Proud to be from Malaga and carefully made with the traditional slow maturation process, with a minimum of 12 days, ensuring its exquisite flavor.
name: Victoria Keg

description: From "Málaga and delicious", reflects the soul of this beer; proud to be from Málaga and carefully brewed to achieve its delicious flavour. It is a beer which is balanced in body and aromas and ideal for any time of day. Its pale yellow colour and head made up of fine, white and bright bubbles stand out. Best served between 4º and 6º C.
name: Victoria, NRB

description: A hoppy, refreshing ale with sweet malt and spicy notes on the palate with a zesty citrus aroma. We create ths gluten free beer using pale ale, caramalt, munich malt and flaked barley with Pioneer,Admiral, cascade and Pilot hops.
name: Wadworth 6X Gold, NRB gluten-free

description: A full bodied, copper colour beer. A malty, fruity nose with a restrained hop character. Full bodied and disctinctive with high drinkability.
name: Wadworth 6X, Cask

description: A timeless amber-hued full bodied ale. The nose is malty and fruity with a balancing hoppy note. The delicious malt and fruit character emerge even more intensley on the palate wth a long, lingering taste.
name: Wadworth 6X, Keg

description: A timeless amber-hued full bodied ale. The nose is malty and fruity with a balancing hoppy note. The delicious malt and fruit character emerge even more intensley on the palate wth a long, lingering taste.
name: Wadworth 6X, NRB

description: A pleasently pale Christmas Ale with rich berry sweetness from added cranberies. A bold, spicy, fruity malt base is contrasted by a mouthwatering tart finish that leaves you ready for the next sip
name: Wadworth Big Baubles, Cask

description: This strong ale has aromas of toasted malt and spicy hops on the nose. It has a strong flavour balanced with a zingy hop bitterness and a long clean finish. FIVE variety of hops make up this great beer - Goldings, Styrian, Saaz, Target and Galaxy combined with a lovely pale ale malted barley.
name: Wadworth Bishops Tipple, NRB

description: This new pale ale of range hue has a striking aroma of cut citrus peels balanced by toffee and caramel from speciality kilned malts. Brewed to showcase hop aroma, the beer finishes with moderate bitterness
name: Wadworth Burnt Orange IPA, Cask

description: Wadworth's own pale golden ale with citrus and hop aromas makes this the ideal choice especially when served cool. An easy drinking, yet full flavoured golden ale created using a blend of classic and new world hops, including Horizon, fuggles, Syrian, cascade and Mosaic hops. A great zesty beer with a crisp finish.
name: Wadworth Horizon, Cask

description: This is a tradionally crafted Indian Pale Ale with a malt led flavour and character. On the nose our IPA provides a delightful malt aroma, on th eplate it delivers a clean and refreshing malt notes, with the classix strong hop flavour, and finishes with a crisp bitterness.
name: Wadworth IPA, Cask

description: This is a tradionally crafted Indian Pale Ale with a malt led flavour and character. On the nose our IPA provides a delightful malt aroma, on the palate it delivers a clean and refreshing malt notes, with the classix strong hop flavour, and finishes with a crisp bitterness.
name: Wadworth IPA, Keg

description: This is a tradionally crafted Indian Pale Ale with a malt led flavour and character. On the nose our IPA provides a delightful malt aroma, on th eplate it delivers a clean and refreshing malt notes, with the classic strong hop flavour, and finishes with a crisp bitterness.
name: Wadworth IPA, NRB

description: A wonderful beer with a nose of gentle rum notes providing a warm hoppy edge. This is a full bodied ale, with a rich smoothness and caramel overtones from dark, unrefined sugars and a rounded hop finish. We add Pussers navy rum to every brew, alongside Fuggles,Golding hops and three types of malt.
name: Wadworth Swordfish, Cask

description: An adapted recipe to meet Gluten Free requirements as defined by EU & UK legislation, without altering the taste, flavour and refreshment that Wainwright is famous for. Isinglass (Fish Bladder) that is used to clarify and help the yeast settle in the beer, has been removed – making the beer Vegan friendly.
name: Wainwright Gluten Free, NRB

description: Wainwright is a shimmering golden ale with subtle sweetness and delicate citrus fruity overtones. Sweet honey flavours compliment a fruitful flavour from the yeast, whilst a soft woody citrus comes through from the hops.
name: Wainwright, Cask

description: Equally appreciated by men and women, with a light golden yellow colour, well-balanced mild and hoppy flavour and a perfectly tart taste.
name: Warsteiner, Keg

description: With all the balanced flavours of a traditional crisp, clean German lager, WEST 4 is light in colour and body. It strikes the perfect balance between malty sweet and bitter hop flavours to deliver an easy-drinking lager with a refreshing zesty finish.
name: WEST 4 Premium Session Lager, Can

description: WEST’s first stout sits like a pint of fresh espresso with its smooth dark body and creamy long-lasting head, alongside a fudgy aroma and bold smoky flavours reminiscent of a French roast coffee. Notice the flavour profile change in WEST Black as the temperature slowly increases in the glass.
name: WEST Black Stout, Keg

description: Named after the patron saint of Glasgow and fellow brewer, this is our flagship Premium Lager. St. Mungo is a perfect hybrid of a traditional Bavarian 'Helles' lager and a Northern German ?Pils?, which makes for a complex yet very drinkable beer. Its natural carbonation and firm crisp taste perfectly counters its malty body.
name: WEST St Mungo Premium Lager, Cans

description: Named after the patron saint of Glasgow and fellow brewer, this is our flagship Premium Lager. St. Mungo is a perfect hybrid of a traditional Bavarian 'Helles' lager and a Northern German ?Pils?, which makes for a complex yet very drinkable beer. Its natural carbonation and firm crisp taste perfectly counters its malty body.
name: WEST St Mungo Premium Lager, NRB

description: POGO is our incredibly drinkable fruited pale ale. Named after the real fruit it’s made from (Passion Fruit, Orange, Guava, and more Orange) it’s a perfect example of how the addition of fruit can be used to complement and accentuate the flavours of beer.
name: Wild Beer Pogo, Can

description: Post mixed fermentation with wild yeast and bacteria we add lemons which have been preserved in salt for 6 months at the brewery. The acidity balanced by the salinity and enhanced byt he intense citrus leaves your mouth watering and gasping for another glass.
name: Wild Beer Sleeping Lemons

description: Wild IPA is the result of eight years of mixed-fermentation learnings and the desire to make the ultimate food pairing IPA. Every step of the development considered the relationship with food, extensively testing it with many differece cuisines. No other beer pairs with food quite like Wild IPA.
name: Wild IPA, Keg

description: A double hopped pale ale. Wild River delivers a tempting citrus aroma that picks out grapefruit, orange peel and lemons. The flavour is a swirling current of spicy, zesty grapefruit notes set against a backdrop of pale malts, while a pleasant hop bitterness lingers long on the palate for an intense finish.
name: Wild River

description: This untamed lager is our alpha male, with growling hop character and a robust mouthfeel. Brewed to bold Bavarian methods and barely reigned in by sweet melon and a snarl of pepper.
name: Wolfpack Lager, Keg

description: This saazy bastard is our easy drinking pilsner. Clean, light and brewed in true bohemian style, it’s madly malty with crisp kicks of spice. Yes, it’s bloody delicious.
name: Wolfpack Pilsner, Keg

description: Velvety hints of rich buttered malt loaf and chilled horlicks are intensified by liquorice and nutty toffee amidst a basket of fruity flavours.
name: Worthington Creamflow, keg

description: Bigmouth is an extra pale, unfiltered, hoppy session ale with a bold tropical and white wine notes from the Nelson-grown New Zealand hops. A luscious mouthfeel, from the wheat and oats, carries the hop flavour across the palate before easing out with a dry (rather than bitter) moreish finish.
name: Yeastie Boys Bigmouth, Can

description: A classic New Zealand hopped IPA featuring clean malt, a medly of citrus and tropical hop flavours, and a bold bitter finish. Digital IPA is chock-full of radical Nelson hops that deliver aroma and flavours reminiscent of a South Pacific holiday – mango, melon, white grape and a hint of citrus.
name: Yeastie Boys Digital IPA, Can

description: Boldly floral nose with stonefruit and citrus flavours and a long dry finish. Utilising judicious amounts of Earl Grey Blue Flower tea to generate an intoxicating floral and citrus aroma with the quenching dry finish of an ice tea. A truly unique new world India Pale Ale with a decidely old world twist.
name: Yeastie Boys Gunnamatta, Can

description: Pours a cloudy pale straw colour with a dense mousse-like white head. A perfumy coconut and vanilla note on the nose, with a little citrus and spice, and bready grains from the wheat. The beer finishes with a cleansing acidity, a faint spicy note and only the mildest touch of citrus from the light hops.
name: Yeastie Boys White Noise White Beer, Can

description: A refreshing cask ale that is golden in colour. A light, dry palate and a fresh, fruity aroma and long, satisfying bitter finish. 100% malt brew Maris Otter and crystal malt with Fuggle and Golding hops.
name: Youngs London Original, cask

description: A smooth, easy drinking, classic London Stout, with aromas of cappucino, dark chocolate and burnt toast on the nose, with roasted malt and coffee coming through on the taste, balanced by full bodied and slightly bittered finish.
name: Young's London Stout 4.3% ABV, Keg

description: 1936 Biere
name: 1936 Biere

description: Everybody from the 313! Our super clean, crisp and refreshing craft lager will quench any thirst. We’ve used Columbus and Hallertau Blanc hops for a citrussy, floral combo which keeps our lager nice and light whilst providing a clean depth of flavour for the ultimate craft lager.
name: 313 Craft Lager

description: Everybody from the 313! Our super clean, crisp and refreshing craft lager will quench any thirst. We’ve used Columbus and Hallertau Blanc hops for a citrussy, floral combo which keeps our lager nice and light whilst providing a clean depth of flavour for the ultimate craft lager.
name: 313 Craft Lager, Keg

description: Ship Full of IPA 0.0% is our first non-alcoholic beer. We take the original 5.8% beer then use vacuum distillation to remove the alcohol. The sweetness of the malt means that this 0.0% retains a full body. We dry-hop for a second time with Amarillo, Citra, Cascade, Ella, and Galaxy.

properties.Brand name: A Ship Full of IPA Non-Alcohol

name: A Ship Full of IPA Non-Alcoholic 0.0%

description: This distinctive full bodied, smooth and mature beer is bursting with fruit cake and toffee flavours.
name: Abbot Ale, NRB

description: Rich in fruitcake aromas, almonds and conserved fruit. Adnams Broadside is a pint to savour. The deep copper colour, the fuller flavour and the premium ABV rewards the drinker in every mouthful.
name: Adnams Broadside, cask

description: Perfect for a summer barbecue. Also goes well with spicy food, pizza, and summer salads.
name: Adnams Ghost Ship 0.5%, Can

description: Perfect for a summer barbecue. Also goes well with spicy food, pizza, and summer salads.
name: Adnams Ghost Ship 0.5%, Keg

description: All the same flavours and aromas as Ghost Ship 4.5% but is no apparition, treating pale ale lovers to 100% of the taste at 0.5%ABV - Spooky! Perfect for a Summer Barbecue. Also goes will with spicy food, Pizza, and Summer salads.
name: Adnams Ghost Ship Alcohol Free, NRB

description: Ghost Ship is inspired by one of Adnams most haunted pubs on the Suffolk coast. A 4.5% pale ale with an assertive pithy bitterness, biscuit flavours and fresh citrus aroma. Brewed with plenty of Citra hops and Pale Ale, Rye Crystal and Cara malts.
name: Adnams Ghost Ship Pale Ale, Keg

description: Ghost Ship is inspired by one of Adnams' most haunted pubs in one of the UK's most haunted villages, The Bell at Walbserswick. The shores of Walberswick are littered with eerie wrecks of smugglers ships from a bygone erea. Ghost Ship is a 4.5% Pale Ale with a good assertive pithy bitterness and a malty backbone. Brewed with PAle Ale, Rye, Crystal and Cara malts we use Citra and a blend of other American hops to create a great citrus flavour.
name: Adnams Ghost Ship, Cask

description: Bold hop characteristics, including peach, mango, lemon and pine flavours and aromas. With big fruity flavours and a Mosaic of aromas
name: Adnams Mosaic Pale Ale, Can

description: Brewed with Pale Ale malt, some lager malt and a touch of light Cara, this single hop beer is made
name: Adnams Mosaic Pale Ale, Keg

description: Brewed with the finest Maris Otter and optic malts, sourced locally to the brewery, with the addition of three hop varieties including First Gold.
name: Adnams Southwold Bitter, cask

description: Classic Andalusian Lager, Blond in colour aromatic and appealing nose and palate with a herbal and lemon characteristic, Easy drinking refreshing low carbonation.
name: Alhambra Especial 30Lx1

description: Ultra premium with a unique embossed bottle, this award winning lager which is brewed over 35 days has a powerful nose of caramel aromas, full flavours on the palate and a satisfying finish.
