name: Alhambra Reserva

description: A golden, easy drinking beer with a punch of tequila flavour, enhanced by the zing of natural south american lime flavour
name: Amigos Tequila flavoured beer, NRB

description: Amstel is the perfect refreshment for moments with your true friends. Spritzy with a subtle citrus and herbal hop character and clean bitter finish.
name: Amstel

description: Amstel is the perfect refreshment for moments with your true friends. Spritzy with a subtle citrus and herbal hop character and clean bitter finish.
name: Amstel, Keg

description: Made in San Francisco with two-row California barley, Cluster hops (the premier hop in 19th-century California), and our own lager yeast, this all-malt brew is kräusened and lagered in our cellars. Its golden color, distinctive aroma, creamy head, balanced depth of flavor, and smooth finish make Anchor California Lager® a delicious celebration of California’s unique craft brewing heritage.
name: Anchor California Lager

description: First introduced in 1975 Liberty Ale is viewed as the first American IPA. Brewed using trational craft methods and using 2 row pale malt, whole cone cascade hops and a distictive yeast.
name: Anchor Liberty Ale

description: Brewed since 1896 this lager/ale hybrid is a true American original. Anchor Steam owes its deep amber colour, thick creamy head and rich, distinctive flavour to a brewing process like no other. It has a light, fruity aroma with minty hop notes.
name: Anchor Steam

description: Established since 1857, originally brewed for pubs in the Midlands and Wales. Extremely popular bitter with a distinctive satisfying taste.
name: Ansells Drum Mild, keg

description: With its refreshing barley flavor and crisp aftertaste, ASAHI SUPER DRY is by far the most popular high-quality beer in Japan.Since its debut in 1987 as Japan’s first dry beer, it has continued to improve the taste and excitement ofbeer. Its taste has set a new standard that is acknowledged around the world today.
name: Asahi Super Dry

description: Born in 1987 Asahi Super Dry sold in the UK is now brewed to the authentic Japanese recipe, using superior ingredients and brewing standards to deliver its dry, crisp taste and quick clean finish. Asahi Super Dry is Japan's No.1 beer and the UK's No.1 Japanese beer.
name: Asahi Super Dry, Can

description: With its refreshing barley flavor and crisp aftertaste, ASAHI SUPER DRY is by far the most popular high-quality beer in Japan.Since its debut in 1987 as Japan’s first dry beer, it has continued to improve the taste and excitement of beer. Its taste has set a new standard that is acknowledged around the world today.
name: Asahi Super Dry, Keg 30lt

description: With its refreshing barley flavor and crisp aftertaste, ASAHI SUPER DRY is by far the most popular high-quality beer in Japan.Since its debut in 1987 as Japan’s first dry beer, it has continued to improve the taste and excitement ofbeer. Its taste has set a new standard that is acknowledged around the world today.
name: Asahi Super Dry, Keg

description: Brewed to 4.4% ABV, Bass Trademark No 1 is still brewed to an original recipe using only the finest ingredients and the experience of generations. Bass is brewed with two strains of yeast to produce a complex nutty, malty taste with subtle hop undertones.
name: Bass NRB

description: A classic ale with a malty, fruity, nutty aroma and a complex, satisfying flavour.
name: Bass Smooth, Keg

description: Gem has a rich aroma of hops and malt and a long, deep, bittersweet finish. An exceptional best bitter brewed using floor malted Maris Otter barley and Goldings hops from East Kent.
name: Bath Ales Gem, cask

description: This premium amber ale has a full malty flavour with hints of toffee.
name: Bath Ales Gem, NRB

description: A deep gold pale ale boasting citrus aromas ,light caramel notes and roboust bitterness. Made with 3 hops Boadicea, Amarillo and Cascade to give a full bodies flavoursome ale….
name: Bear Island East Coast Pale Ale, Keg

description: A hop-forward lager that is distinctive in both flavour and design, the bright colour pallet reflects the burst of tropical fruit aromas such as mango and passion fruit. The subtle malts then leaves a clean, smooth and refreshing finish expected of a lager.
name: Bear Island Lager, Keg

description: Bones - smooth, crisp, refreshing and brewed using our unique gold award winning Beavertown recipe. A low bitterness lager with a hint of citrus and the smoothest, cleanest aftertaste that delivers the ultimate, thirst quenching, easy drinking experience for you and all your mates. Guaranteed to hit the spot from your first pint to your last.
name: Beavertown Bones Lager, Keg

description: The concept was to create a juicy topical beer. A brew you can sit on and drink all day, rammed with juicy malts and huge tropical aromas of mango and grapefruit. Massive additions of American Hops are added to the whirlpool giving huge hop flavour.
name: Beavertown Gamma Ray American Pale Ale, Can

description: The concept was to create a juicy topical beer. A brew you can sit on and drink all day, rammed with juicy malts and huge tropical aromas of mango and grapefruit. Massive additions of American Hops are added to the whirlpool giving huge hop flavour.
name: Beavertown Gamma Ray American Pale Ale, Keg

description: Our every day, all day, easy drinking, go to IPA. This started life as a home brew. We wanted to create a light, crisp, punchy go to beer. A beer that you know you can pick up and appreciate or simply get it down ya neck.
name: Beavertown Neck Oil Session IPA, Can

description: Our every day, all day, easy drinking, go to IPA. This started life as a home brew. We wanted to create a light, crisp, punchy go to beer. A beer that you know you can pick up and appreciate or simply get it down ya neck.
name: Beavertown Neck Oil Session IPA, Keg

description: This malt beverage has less than 0.5% alcohol by volume, but has 100% of the taste. Beck's beer is a lager brewed according to the German beer purity law.
name: Becks Blue, NRB

description: Voodoo Ranger embraces the unconventional in beer and in life and is served with a side of irreverence. Brilliant hazy pale gold, with flavours of pineapple, guava, soft citrus (lemon, grapefruit & orange) and a building bitterness that fades quickly to a clean finish.
name: Belgium Voodoo Ranger Hazy IPA

description: Voodoo Ranger embraces the unconventional in beer and in life, and is served with a side of irreverence. Brilliant hazy pale gold, with flavours of pineapple, guava, soft citrus (lemon, grapefruit & orange) and a building bitterness that fades quickly to a clean finish.
name: Belgium Voodoo Ranger Hazy IPA Keg

description: The quintessential quaffable beer. Honey-coloured Belhaven Best is smooth and beautifully balanced in taste and body.
name: Belhaven Best, keg

description: 80/- is Belhaven's classic, hand-pulled, cask-conditioned ale. It has a classic red appearance in the glass, rich and smooth. An Austrian Emperor once described 80/- as 'the burgundy of Scotland'.
name: Belhaven Export 80/- , NRB

description: Bellerose is unique and doesn’t really fit in a defined beer category. It is dryer and not as malty as a Bie?re de Garde, less bitter than an IPA, so we like to define it as a "Hoppy Saison." It is a delicate beer with aromas of lychee and citrus with floral and biscuit notes.
name: Bellerose Blonde Extra, NRB

description: Bellfield Brewery Bohemian Pilsner 4.5 % Abv, Gluten Free. A noble classic Czech pilsner, pale with a light body, slight background bitterness and gentle floral tones from the finest Saaz hops, leading to a soft refreshing finish. Served Chilled. A great food companion.
name: Bellfield Bohemian Pilsner Gluten Free Can

description: A noble classic Czech pilsner, pale with a light body, slight background bitterness and gentle floral tones from the finest Saaz hops leading to a soft refreshing finish.
name: Bellfield Bohmenian Pilsner, Keg

description: Old and New World hops - Ekuanot and Mandarina Bavaria - combine to produce a light fruit and floral character. This modern interpretation of a classic lager is biscuity and quaffable.
name: Bellfield Craft Lager, Can

description: Bellfield Brewery Lawless Village IPA 4.5 % Abv, Gluten Free. Named after our neighbourhood of Portobello. A copper coloured aromatic beer brewed as a traditional American IPA, made with pale and crystal malts and Centennial and Cascade American hops for a modern citrusy finish. Enjoy this renegade chilled with friends..
name: Bellfield Lawless Village IPA Gluten Free Can

description: A copper coloured, aromatic beer brewed as a traditional American IPA made with pale and crystal malts and Cascade and Centennial American hops for a modern, citrusy finish.
name: Bellfield Lawless Village IPA, Keg

description: Citrus tones from the hops deliver flavour and aroma. The hop bitterness is balanced by fine malt character, making this beer very moreish.
name: Bellfield Session Ale, Can

description: Berliner Pilsner has been a stalwart of Berlin culture since its introduction to the German Democratic Republic in 1963. This crisp, refreshing German Pilsner is now the best selling beer in the city.
name: Berliner Pilsner, Keg

description: PALE ALE + BIG BODY + MOSAIC HOPS Our session ale is the perfect fit for a can - fast, easy and delicious. Packed full of hops aromas with a solid malt base it’s a beer for all occasions. The name ‘Bibble’ in Somerset dialect means to drink loudly, often and well.
name: Bibble Cask

description: Our session pale ale has complex troipical notes with a citrus kick due to large Mozaic dry hop. Adding, Vienna Malt provides a balance to these hops without being over powering. Finally using Oats in our recipe creates a richer mouth-feel complimenting the flavoursome ingrdients.
name: Bibble Pale Ale, Keg

description: This will delight if you’re a fan of fruity, crisp beers. Pale in colour but robust in flavour and very refreshing. Expect a large fruit juice aroma with lime, grapefruit and a hint of spiciness. A delicate blend of mango, passion fruit and pineapple flavours, combined with a light, crisp refreshing body, finishing with a smooth caramel aftertaste.
name: Big Drop Citra IPA 0.5%, Keg

description: A juicy, hop forward Pale Ale with low end bitterness and large quantities of Mosaic and Chinook. Oats and wheat give a good body despite its lighter ABV. Unfiltered and naturally hazy with a good aroma and juicy, fruity taste profile. Notes of melon, peach and stonefruit with some citrus and a low malt profile. Matches with chicken,pasta,salad.
name: Big Hug Juicy Pale, Can

description: A juicy, hop forward Pale Ale with low end bitterness and large quantities of Mosaic and Chinook. Oats and wheat give a good body despite its lighter ABV. Unfiltered and naturally hazy with a good aroma and juicy, fruity taste profile. Notes of melon, peach and stonefruit with some citrus and a low malt profile. Matches with chicken,pasta,salad.
name: Big Hug Juicy Pale, Keg

description: A fresh, crisp, clean, easy drinking Pilsner with a light malty nose, floral hoppy aroma and a smooth delicate finish with a slight sweetness. A hopping regime of Magnum for bittering and Perle for aroma with a good body and slight haze. Matches with fish, chicken, seafood and pasta.
name: Big Hug Pilsner Lager, Keg

description: A hybrid style beer rarely seen in the UK. A high percentage of malted wheat, combined with generous amounts of citra and chinook to give a beautifully light & refreshing citrus flavour & aroma. Unfiltered, unfined and unpasteurised. Lowered front end bitterness gives greater emphasis on drinkability. Cloudy like a wheat beer, tastes like an IPA.
name: Big Hug White IPA, Can

description: A cross between a wheat beer and an IPA, Big Hug's signature brew is cloudy and full bodied like a wheat beer but tastes like an IPA. A high percentage of malted wheat & neutral yeast are combined with generous amounts of citra & chinook to give a beautifully fresh, light citrus profile with a full body and soft bitter finish. Matches spiced food.
name: Big Hug White IPA, Keg

description: A simple golden lager brewed with Senator Cappelli wheat and orange peel, amazingly “lagered” by BdB. The crisp and fresh aromas of cereals are intriguing and elegant. The sip reveals honey flavours balanced by a nice, soft bitterness and clean, dry finish.
name: Birra Del Borgo Lisa, Keg

description: A well balanced lager with some hoppy and fruity notes finished with moderate bitterness and a clean aftertaste.
name: Birra Moretti 0.0%

description: A well balanced lager with some hoppy and fruity notes finished with moderate bitterness and a clean aftertaste.
name: Birra Moretti Blade, Keg

description: A well balanced lager with some hoppy and fruity notes finished with moderate bitterness and a clean aftertaste.
name: Birra Moretti Brewlock, Keg

description: The ultimate Italian lager since 1859, Birra Moretti’s special blend of high quality hops creates a smooth, full bodied beer with wholemeal bread top notes which are cut by a delicate citrus note.
name: Birra Moretti, Can

description: A well balanced lager with some hoppy and fruity notes finished with moderate bitterness and a clean aftertaste.
name: Birra Moretti, Keg

description: The ultimate Italian lager since 1859, Birra Moretti’s special blend of high quality hops creates a smooth, full bodied beer with wholemeal bread top notes which are cut by a delicate citrus note.
name: Birra Moretti, Keg

description: The ultimate Italian lager since 1859, Birra Moretti’s special blend of high quality hops creates a smooth, full bodied beer with wholemeal bread top notes which are cut by a delicate citrus note.
name: Birra Moretti, NRB

description: Birrificio Angelo Poretti 3 Luppoli is a highly drinkable lager-style beer conditioned at low temperature. Its colour is light and the head is compact, fine and sticky. With its clear appearance and fine carbonation, it is characterised by a light body, with balanced bitterness and flavour.
name: Birra Poretti Draughtmaster 3, Keg

description: A traditional Italian beer and a perfect companion for traditional Italian food.
name: Birra Poretti, keg

description: Birrificio Angelo Poretti is a full-flavoured lager with a higher level of bitterness that is the norm for a world lager brand. This bitterness ignites your appetite and enhances flavours of food, bitterness is a traditional flavour profile that the Italians have taken advantage of for hundreds of years to elevate dining experiences.
name: Birrificio Angelo Poretti, NRB

description: A cult, complex & wholesome Kentish ale that melds rich, melodious notes of toffee and dark fruit with a piquant, peppery hop profile leading to a dry, mineral-rich finish.
name: Bishops Finger, Cask

description: The dominant character of this premium ale is its generous, fruity flavour, reminiscent of bananas and pears with citrus overtones. A full bodied, nut-brown, nourishing ale with a lingering hoppy finish.
name: Bishops Finger, NRB

description: A full flavoured ale with a rich fruit nose, a malty taste and a long, dry, bitter finish. Brewed with generous handfuls of choice Goldings hops.
name: Black Sheep Ale, NRB

description: This is a classic well-hopped and beautifully balanced beer with a rich, creamy head. It has a refreshing taste that is followed by a distinctively dry and long bitter finish.
name: Black Sheep Best Bitter, Cask

description: Black Sheep Ale is a full flavoured, premium bitter with a rich fruity aroma. Made using plenty of choice Golding hops which give it a roast coffee maltiness followed by Black Sheep’s characteristic refreshingly dry and bitter finish.
name: Black Sheep Bitter, Keg

description: Golden Sheep is a beautifully balanced blonde cask beer with a dry finish. A light golden ale that develops with zesty grapefruit and other citrus fruits, with a clean, crisp bitterness and long refreshing finish.
name: Black Sheep Golden Sheep, NRB

description: Monty Python’s Holy Grail is a light golden beer with a fresh, zesty taste and a long crisp bitter finish. It’s brewed with a mixture of hops, including WGV, which gives the beer a light fruity nose. It’s a real tongue pleaser.
name: Black Sheep Monty Python Holy Grail, Cask

description: This strong, velvety ruby brown beer is deceptively clean drinking, with a wonderfully complex palate of coffee, bananas and liquorice with a long, dry Goldings hop finish.
name: Black Sheep Riggwelter, NRB

description: White wheat, rolled oats, coriander and Valencia & Navel orange peel are used in the brewing of Blue Moon to create a refreshing, unfiltered wheat beer with a unique, complex taste and an uncommonly smooth finish.
name: Blue Moon, Keg

description: A Beer this good only comes around once in a Blue Moon. The flavour starts crisp and tangy and ends with a coriander and orange spiciness. The Valencia orange peel gives a subtle sweetness to the beer.
name: Blue Moon, NRB

description: Brewed at the famous Strangeways Brewery in Manchester, Boddingtons was first exported in 1994 and is now enjoyed in English style pubs and bars in more than 30 countries around the world.
name: Boddingtons Draught, Can

description: Boddingtons is a medium-bodied pale ale, that is renowned for its golden color, distinctive creamy head, smooth body and easy drinking character. It has a creamy, malty and slightly sweet flavor and features a clean, smooth aftertaste.
name: Boddingtons, Keg

description: This bitter features a burnished copper colour and peppery-hops aroma with a wonderful mix of rich malt flavours, tangy hops and sultana fruit flavours and a spicy finish.
name: Bombardier, Cask

description: This bitter features a burnished copper colour and peppery-hops aroma, with a wonderful mix of rich malt flavours, tangy hops and sultana fruit flavours and a spicy finish.
name: Bombardier, keg

description: This bitter features a burnished copper colour and peppery-hops aroma with a wonderful mix of rich malt flavours, tangy hops and sultana fruit flavours and a spicy finish.
name: Bombardier, NRB

description: A light, easy drinking beer which is well balanced and refreshing, creating the complete Welsh beer experience – cementing it as the preferred pint of Wales.
name: Brains Bitter Smooth KEG

description: This pale ale packs a full throttle inspired bu US- Style pale ales. Big citrussy aromas of lime zest and lemongrass explode from the glass against a light caramel malt backbone, with bloosoming resinous hop aromas to follow. At first sip, there's a light brittle toffee malt flavour, before grapefruit and pine come crashing in.
name: Brewdog Dead Pony Club, Can

description: This pale ale packs a full throttle by US-Style pale ales. Big Citrussy aromas of lime zest and lemongrass explode from the glass, against a light caramel malt backbone, with blooming resinous hop aromas to follow. At first sip, there's light brittle toffee malt flavour, before grapefruit and pine come crashing in.
name: Brewdog Dead Pony Club, Keg

description: Dead Pony Club is a low amplitude, high voltage hop hit. Alive with flavour it’s hopped to the Pacific shores and back. Dive in to aromas of citrus, lemon-grass and lime zest. The toasted malt base ebbs to a huge hop hit, washing tropical fruit, floral garlands and spicy undertones all over your palate.
name: Brewdog Dead Pony Club, NRB

description: New England detuned. This full-tilt fruit machine of an IPA packs all the flavour but less of the alcohol. Notes of pineapple,mango, stone-fruit, and a hint of tangerine to mix it up. Brewed with oats and wheat and left unfiltered for a smooth juicy hit.
name: Brewdog Hazy Jane, Can

description: New England detuned. This full-tilt fruit machine of an IPA packs all the flavour but less of the alcohol. Notes of pineapple,mango, stone-fruit, and a hint of tangerine to mix it up. Brewed with oats and wheat and left unfiltered for a smooth juicy hit.
name: Brewdog Hazy Jane, Keg

description: This pilsner combines the light, crisp and clean lager profile provideded by Weihenstephan's house yeast, with the vibrant citrus and stonefruit aromas associated with new German hop Saphir. This lager is easy-going but has subtle depths; toast, hints of spice and a zesty lime marmalade character.
name: Brewdog Lost Lager, Keg

description: If you think low alcohol equals low taste, think again. We made a hardcore beer and left the alcohol out. Nanny State breaks the curfew and slips under the radar. A brigade of speciality malts and North American hops sends bitterness to the brink and back. Squeezing this many hops in, and the alcohol out, is a testament to our craft.
name: Brewdog Nanny State, NRB

description: Our homage to the great American Pale Ale. The beer that started a revolution, transformed brewing and changed perceptions of what beer can be. Heavy on hops with intense aromas of pine and citrus. A classic American Pale Ale built in Scotland. Beer like it should be.
name: BrewDog Planet Pale, Can

description: Our homage to the great American Pale Ale. The beer that started a revolution, transformed brewing and changed perceptions of what beer can be. Heavy on hops with intense aromas of pine and citrus. A classic American Pale Ale built in Scotland. Beer like it should be.
name: BrewDog Planet Pale, Keg

description: No alcohol just got Punked up. And Punk AF lives up to its billing. All the attutude, all the flavour but none of the alcohol, Say hello to the Punkest non alcoholic beer in town. Juicy tropical fruit mixes it up with grassy and pine notes. All sitting on a solid malt bassline. Full flavour, no alcohol, all Punk.
name: Brewdog Punk AF, Keg

description: Tropical fruit mixes it up with grassy and pine notes. All sitting on solid malt foundations.
name: Brewdog Punk Alchohol Free IPA, NRB

description: No alcohol just got Punked up. And Punk AF lives up to its billing. All the attitude, all the flavour but none of the alcohol. Say hello to the Punkest alcohol free beer in town. Juicy tropical fruit mixes it up with grassy and pine notes. All sitting on a solid malt bassline. Full flavour, no alcohol, all Punk.
name: Brewdog Punk Alcohol Free, Can

description: This light, golden classic has been subverted with new world hops to create an explosion of flavour. Bursts of caramel and tropical fruit with an all-out riot of grapefruit, pineapple and lychee, precede a spiky bitter finish.
name: Brewdog Punk IPA, Can

description: This light, golden classic has been subverted with new world hops to create an explosion of flavour. Bursts of caramel and tropical fruit with an all-out riot of grapefruit, pineapple and lychee, precede a spiky bitter finish.
name: Brewdog Punk IPA, NRB

description: Clean Water Lager - Made with crystal malts and a completely unique blend of Sorachi Ace and Saaz Hops that explodes the possibilites of the traditional lager style. No other lager style tastes quite like ours, no other beer provides other with clean drinking water. Drink Beer give water.
name: Brewgooder Lager, Can

description: COLOUR Clear, Pale Gold SMELL Citrus, Lemon Zest, Biscuit TASTE Crisp, refreshing pilsner style from the Saaz – Subtle lemon & banana from the Sorachi Ace
name: Brewgooder Lager, Steel Keg

description: A session IPA with a difference. Dry-hopped with Citra to provide a floral, tropical aroma, the full-bodied and bold flavours are complemented by the addition of oats providing a robust mouthfeel at a sessionable ABV.
name: Brewgooder Session IPA, Can

description: A session IPA with a difference. Dry-hopped with Citra to provide a floral, tropical aroma, the full-bodied and bold flavours are complemented by the addition of oats providing a robust mouthfeel at a sessionable ABV.
name: Brewgooder Session IPA, Keg

description: A bold, fresh Tropical IPA. Using citrus forward Citra, Cascade and Magnum Hops the beer provides fresh, tropical flavours acentuated by the addtion of natural Mango and Passion Fruit extract. All perfectly complemented by a clean, crisp malt profile.
name: Brewgooder Tropical Pale IPA, Can

description: A bold, fresh Tropical IPA. Using citrus forward Citra, Cascade and Magnum Hops the beer provides fresh, tropical flavours acentuated by the addtion of natural Mango and Passion Fruit extract. All perfectly complemented by a clean, crisp malt profile.
name: Brewgooder Tropical Pale IPA, Keg

description: Award-winning American Pale Ale is packed with bold, tropical flavours. It’s a fruity, vibrant brew, inspired by the exotic, aromatic wares of the Brixton market stalls on Atlantic Road.
name: Brixton Atlantic APA, Keg

description: Crisp, clean and floral. Fresh, vibrant and alive with flavour.
name: Brixton Coldharbour, Can

description: Crisp, clean and floral. Fresh, vibrant and alive with flavour.
name: Brixton Coldharbour, Keg

description: Brooklyn Defender IPA is a hereoically hopped golden IPA featuring stromg notes of tropical fruit, well muscled hop bitterness, and an incredibly dry finish.
name: Brooklyn Defender IPA

description: Hereoically hopped golden IPA featuring stromg notes of tropical fruit, well muscled hop bitterness, and an incredibly dry finish.
name: Brooklyn Defender, Can

description: Brooklyn Lager is amber-gold in colour and displays a firm malt centre supported by a refreshing bitterness and floral hop aroma, with caramel malts in the finish. The aromatic qualities of the beer are enhanced by “dry-hopping”, the centuries-old practice of steeping the beer with fresh hops as it undergoes a long, cold maturation.
name: Brooklyn Lager 5%, Keg

description: Amber-gold in color with a firm malt center and supported by a refreshing bitterness and floral hop aroma. Caramel malts show in the finish.
name: Brooklyn Lager Draughtmaster, Keg

description: Brooklyn Lager is amber-gold in colour, with a malt centre that is refreshing, bitter and floral. Its aroma comes from 'dry-hopping', the centuries-old-practise of steeping the beer with fresh hops during a long, cold maturation. When this British technique meets Viennese-style beer, it creates this true American original.
name: Brooklyn Lager, NRB

description: Crisp, golden and strikingly fun, this is Pilsner born in Brooklyn and brewed for all. For the wanderers, the dreamers and go-with-the-flowers. The newcomers, the old timers and the pop in and outers. It’s the beacon of joy that brings us all together and fires up good times.
name: Brooklyn Pilsner

description: Brooklyn Special Effects is a hoppy alcohol free lager with an unexpected piney aroma and pleasantly bitter finish. The beer gets its bready sweetness from from a blend of pale caramel and dark roasted Munich malts and its suprising nose from its dry-hopping with mosaic, citra and amarillo hops - a technique rarely used in non-alcolhol brewing.
name: Brooklyn Special Effects Low Alcohol Draughtmaster, Keg

description: Brooklyn Special Effects is a hoppy alcohol free lager with an unexpected piney aroma and pleasantly bitter finish. The beer gets its bready sweetness from from a blend of pale caramel and dark roasted Munich malts and its suprising nose from its dry-hopping with mosaic, citra and amarillo hops - a technique rarely used in non-alcolhol brewing.
name: Brooklyn Special Effects Low Alcohol, NRB

description: Bud Light is an American style lager brewed light for a refreshing taste, a crisp, clean finish, and a smooth drinkability. Our beer is a perfectly balanced light body lager with a hint of sweetness. It's pale golden colour is accompanied by a floral aroma and slightly hoppy, slightly malty and fresh yeasty notes
name: Bud Light 6x4

description: Refreshing, crisp taste with no compromise on quality.
name: Bud Light Can

description: Refreshing, crisp taste with no compromise on quality.
name: Bud Light Keg

description: Bud Zero delivers the great taste and crisp finish of Budweiser just without the alcohol and delivers a smoothness and drinkability perfect for every occasion.
name: Bud Zero, Can

description: The original Czech Budweiser is a full-bodied, malty lager with plenty of hoppy bite.
name: Budvar Budweiser

description: A retro-beer designed to taste and look like all Central European lagers did before the now familiar golden brew came on the scene in the mid-19th Century. A mix of 4 Moravian barley malts, whole Saaz hops, original yeast and spring water from an Ice Age lake 300 metres under the brewery. A low carbonated, smooth and full flavoured beer.
name: Budvar Budweiser Dark, NRB

description: The original Czech Budweiser is a full-bodied, malty lager with plenty of hoppy bite.
name: Budvar Budweiser, Can

description: The original Czech Budweiser is a full-bodied, malty lager with plenty of hoppy bite.
name: Budvar Budweiser, Keg

description: The original Czech Budweiser is a full-bodied, malty lager with plenty of hoppy bite.
name: Budvar Budweiser, NRB

description: Medium-bodied, flavorful, crisp American-style lager, craft brewed with a blend of premium hop varieties.
name: Budweiser 4.5%, Keg

description: Alcohol free lager with a sweet malt taste and a hint of bitterness.
name: Budweiser Budvar Non-Alcoholic, NRB

description: Budweiser is the only major beer in the world using the traditional beechwood ageing process to naturally age the beer. Budweiser is brewed with a combination of 2-row and 6-row barley malt to achieve a very specific flavour balance.
name: Budweiser Can

description: Budweiser is the only major beer in the world using the traditional beechwood ageing process to naturally age the beer. Budweiser is brewed with a combination of 2-row and 6-row barley malt to achieve a very specific flavour balance.
