description: Wonderful fruit-driven flavours for rich seafood, tasty chicken or spicy pork dishes.
name: Santa Rita 120 Delight Pinot Grigio, Central Valley

description: Colour intense red with purple tints.Nose fragrances of red fruit with notes of blackberries, blackcurrants and cherries.Palate riche, subtle and elegant. This wine remains supple and easy-to-drink. Food pairing pairs perfectly with lamb, game and meat in a sauce or stew.
name: Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire Mon Plaisir Rouge, Chateau des Ferrages

description: A light, fresh and clean rosé with just a hint of sweetness. Lovely aroma's of strawberries and raspberries, with red summer fruits on the palate. Refreshing with a lasting finish.
name: Oratoire St Pierre Vin Rosé

description: Delicately fragrant, with hints of berry fruits, bread yeast and balsamic complexity. Dry, clean and elegant, with a delicate flavours of sweet almonds and sweet spice.
name: Ferrari Maximum Rose NV

description: This ruby red wine is very complex, delicate and elegant with aromas of red currant, red cherries, leather and tobacco with spicy overtones such as lavender, thyme and rosemary. Excellent balance in the mouth, tannins are elegant and silky.
name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape, Les Clefs du Paradis

description: A rich red wine with flavours of raspberries, cherries & blackcurrants with toasted oak and a touch of mocha. Easy to drink, soft medium bodied.
name: Footsteps Malbec, Central Valley

description: Made with 87% Glera and 13% Pinot Noir from the Veneto & Fruili regions of North Eastern Italy. This vibrant pale pink Prosecco is freshing with light summer fruits with a hint of white peach.
name: Galanti Prosecco Spumante Rosé DOC Extra Dry

description: Sweet cherries and dried strawberries with hints of hibiscus tea. On the palate, this wine presents itself as a light bodied Pinot Noir with nuance of violets, Chambord, cedar, smokey mocha oak and classic black pepper notes of Sta. Rita Hills fruit.
name: Lincourt Rancho Santa Rosa Pinot Noir, Santa Rita Hills

description: Crafted at the foothills of the Andes Mountains, this intense anf full Malbec offers layers of dark berry fruits, vanilla and cloves and a smooth, velvety finish.
name: Alamos City Malbec

description: The French would call this wine a ‘petite Sancerre’ because of its similarity in style to the classic wine. Made using 100% Sauvignon Blanc from the Loire Valley, much of it from young vines in Mellot’s vineyards in Sancerre and Pouilly. Young vines give seductive hints of grapefruit and gooseberries.
name: Joseph Mellot Destinéa Sauvignon Blanc, Vin de France

description: The higher altitude of the Eden Valley, about 700 metres above sea level, makes for cool nights and mild daytime temperatures ideal for producing wines with fresh acidity. The grapes are harvested in the early hours of the morning, pressed cold and the juice fermented in stainless steel to preserve the delicate fruit characters of the variety. Shows aromas of flint and spice intermingled with lemon flowers and lime peel; the palate is vibrant with citrus and minerally notes.
name: St Hallett Riesling, Eden Valley

description: A blend of grapes hand-harvested from vineyards with different soils, from west to east Les Bessards of granitic origin, constitutes the ‘soul’ of a good Hermitage; Le Méal on an old alluvial terrace, with a lot of gravel and shingle more or less calcareous; Les Greffieux with its silty soil with shingle. Entirely de-stemmed, the grapes ferment in concrete tanks with one to two daily treadings to ensure a good extraction. The temperature varies between 30 and 33°C. The ageing is performed in oak casks between 12 and 14 months. This gives to the wine an oak-spice aroma which is a component of the bouquet. Several rackings allow a slow and natural clarification. Deep garnet-red, with purplish lights; it shows raspberry and blackcurrant with a hint of liquorice and spicy, black pepper. Round and elegant, the wine has concentrated and gentle tannins followed by a lingering fresh finish.
name: Hermitage, Monier de la Sizeranne, Organic, M.Chapoutier

description: The Verdejo grape is an aromatic variety, this wine shows melon and green apple on the palate with floral notes on the finish.
name: El Velero Verdejo Blanco, Valdepeñas

description: A 100% unoaked Chardonnay made with the latest techniques of cool-fermentation. A stunning, youthful wine which reveals plenty of delicate, aromatic notes followed by vibrant, refreshing fruit on the palate.
name: Raimat Castell Chardonnay, Costers del Segre

description: Fruity scent of pears and apples with overtones of blackberries. A good balance between the natural acidity and sugars in the Glera and Pinot Noir grapes makes this sparkling wine both delicate in colour and intense in flavour.
name: Da Luca Prosecco Rosé

description: An evocative pink peach blossom colour with a fruity bouquet and notes of red berries and grapefruit. The prolonged maturation on the yeasts gives it honey and bread crust aromas.
name: Mionetto Prestige Prosecco Rosé

description: Beautifully pale pink shade with delicate, alluring aromas of fresh summer berries and white blossom. Refined and refreshing on the palate with a fruity, crisp finish.
name: Kylie Minogue Rosé, Vin de France

description: A modern style of Sauvignon Blanc with a fresh and lively nose of lime blossom and gooseberry. Zesty and crisp on the palate with a mouth-watering green apple and lemon finish.
name: Kylie Minogue Sauvignon Blanc, Cotes de Gascone

description: Leslies Reserve Rosé is made using the classic varieties, from carefully curated cuvées. Bright pale apricot pink colour with a nose of rose petal and redcurrant. The palate is driven by a crisp British acidity with hints of wild strawberry and raspberry. A delicate style, wonderful as an aperitif or served alongside some delicious seafood.
name: Balfour Leslie's Reserve Rose

description: Brilliant rosè colour, fine and persistent perlage; on the nose intense notes of white peach, citrus and wild strawberry, accompanied with some floral aromas.
name: Bolla Prosecco Rosé Brut

description: Fresh and expressive aromas of pear, quince and lemon curd, interwoven with toasty oak notes. Vibrant purity of the fruit with beautiful texture and good depth lead to a long memorable finish.
name: Veramonte Reserva Organic Chardonnay, Casablanca Valley

description: Fresh, bright and crisp intense strawberry and cherry aromas are mingled wiwth citrus, herbal and floral notes. Lush texture and fresh acidity that lead to a long crisp finish.
name: Veramonte Organic Reserva Rosé Pinot Noir, Casablanca Valley

description: An enticing nose of white pepper, violets, cigar, vanilla and cassis. On the palate it is a mouthwatering melange of dark berry, plum and hedgrow fruit flavours backed by earthy tones of herb giving way to a spice laden finish. The toasty vanilla from the oak comes through on a warming cassis finish.
name: Banshee Mordecai Red, California

description: This Rosé originates from both Beaujolais and Burgundy which is 100% Gamay from hand-harvested grapes that were gently pressed, using saignée method, in order to deliver this vibrant, juicy wine full of fresh raspberry notes.
name: Coteaux Bourguignons Rosé Louis Jadot, Burgundy

description: A beautifully crisp and fresh Chardonnay from the foothills of the Andes Mountains. Bright and zingy, with white nectarine and flinty notes on the balanced, mineral palate. Aged for 6month in old French oak.
name: Familia Zuccardi Brazos Chardonnay, Mendoza

description: Intense and dark red coloured wine. On the nose it brings typical Cabernet Franc aromas of blackcurrant and blueberry mingled with spicy notes of tobacco. On the palate it is wide and intense, with a lingering finish.
name: Salentein Barrel Selection Cabernet Franc, Mendoza

description: Elegant and refreshing white wine to serve at about 12°C for appetizer or to pair with grilled fish, seafood or with a plate of goat cheese. To be drunk within 2 years.
name: Muscadet Paul Buisse Prestige

description: Jewel of Languedoc, in the south of France, the City of Carcassonne is classified as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. This wine presents a deep salmon colour. On the nose, it reveals very fruity notes of wild strawberry and a slightly amyl aroma. Long on the palate with a nice structure. Served at 10 - 12°C as an aperitif orwith shellfish or fish.
name: Gerard Bertrand Domaine de L'Estagnere Rosé, Occitanie

description: Prima Nature is a range of without added sulfite wines that offer particularly pure, generous and intense aromas. This cuvée has a beautiful pale pink colour and reveals delicate and tasty aromas of red fruits, raspberry and strawberry on the nose. The palate is delicate and opens on floral notes. Enjoyed at 10°C as an aperitif, with salads.
name: Gerard Bertrand Prima Nature Grenache Rosé Organic, Occitanie

description: Dry and easy drinking, with subtle pear and apple fruit.
name: Bonavita Pinot Grigio, IGT Pavia

description: A refreshing aromatic Riesling made in an off-dry style; the aromatic perfumed fruit is offset by Granny Smith apple, lime blossom, kaffir lime zest and honeysuckle. The gently scented fruit and spice is accentuated on the palate by a mineral, citrussy acidity. The perfectly poised balance makes this a versatile and complex food wine. Try it with pork chops, sticky rice and Thai green-chile sauce.
name: Te Kairanga Riesling, Martinborough

description: The 2014 vintage is a blend of 56% Chardonnay, 22% Pinot Noir, 22% Pinot Meunier. The grapes were hand picked and whole bunch pressed, following the second fermentation the wines is aged on its lees for a minimum of 48 months. An elegant and complex wine, with layers of citrusy fruits and a vibrant mineral finish.
name: Greyfriars Classic Cuvée Brut, England

description: A Blanc de Noirs, made ??from Pinot Noir grapes, given away by the wine’s subtle amber hues. The fruit reaches the winery at a low temperature and is quickly and gently pressed so as to avoid the ‘must’ picking up too much colour from the skins. Made by the Traditional Method and aged for a minimum of nine months. Shows notes of red fruits on the nose; the palate also offers up gooseberry and blackberry alongside a minerally character.
name: Anna de Codorníu Blanc de Noirs Brut Cava

description: The Gran Reserva is made from the highest quality wines, a blend of 90% Tempranillo and 10% Graciano,aged for 2 years in American oak barrels followed by 3 years further maturation in bottle. Notes of red fruit including cherry and plum and backed by vanilla spice on the nose. This wine shows the hallmarks of Rioja Alta showing bright fruit flavours that are fine and elegantly assembled.
name: Viña Pomal Rioja Gran Reserva, Bodegas Bilbaínas

description: A rich red wine with flavours of raspberries, cherries & blackcurrants with toasted oak and a touch of mocha. Easy to drink, soft medium bodied.
name: Footsteps Malbec, Central Valley

description: Lively Vermentino made by whole bunch pressing of the grapes without any sulphur. Grapefruit and ripe citrus fruit characters jump out of the glass, with a fruity palate enhanced by fresh acidity.
name: Marius by M.Chapoutier Vermentino, Pays d'Oc

description: A Trento DOC with great personality, characterised by freshness, fragrance and finesse it is designed for the restaurant sector and other high-quality venues.
name: Ferrari Maximum Blanc de Blancs

description: Harmonious and well-balanced, with flavours of ripe apple and wild flowers underpinned by attractive hints of crusty bread.
name: Ferrari Brut NV

description: Pale lemon in colour, with vibrant aromas of citrus fruit and freshly cut grass. The palate is packed with juicy lemon, lime and melon flavours and finishes with a crisp, refreshing acidity. A perfect companion to most fish dishes, seafood salads, cottage or goats' cheese.
name: Analivia Rueda Sauvignon Blanc, Rueda

description: "Cigalus enjoys a hot, sunny arid Mediterranean climate with temperate spring variants, ensuring an early ripening of all the grape varieties. Full and silky, ripe, ample mouth with notes of vanilla, toast, butter and exotic fruits. Good length in the mouth. Serve at 10 - 12°C with fried scallops, fish cooked in sauce, or as an aperitif."
name: Gerard Bertrand Cigalus Organic White (Presentation box), Occitanie

description: Prima Nature is a range of without added sulfite wines that offer particularly pure, generous and intense aromas. This wine has a beautiful deep red colour with garnet reflections. This round and and fruity Merlot reveals greedy aromas of subtly spicy red fruits. Serve at 16°C with a risotto or vegetable wok.
name: Gerard Bertrand Prima Nature Merlot Organic, Occitanie

description: The grapes are sourced from seven of the nine Durbanville Hills member farms and three of them have high altitude vineyards growing on the south-eastern slopes of the Hooge Berg Valley. Crushing and juice handling vary from immediate draining to an average of four hours skin contact. This happens under a layer of dry ice to preserve the typical delicate flavours that are fragile during these first stages of the winemaking process, some ageing on the lees is also employed. A delightful combination of papaya, grapefruit, lime and melon on the nose, the palate is a combination of fruit flavours and green pepper with a crisp acidity and full mouth-feel.
name: Durbanville Hills Sauvignon Blanc, Durbanville

description: Finely-textured with complex notes of honey, toasted almond, pastry and baked apples, acheived by spending three years of fermenting in the bottle on the lees. A great combination of intensity, delicacy and length – it’s no wonder it’s consistently crowned one of the best English sparkling wines.
name: Nyetimber Classic Cuvee, England

description: Delicate and subtle, with mineral notes combined with an explosion of white pear, tropical fruit and citrus notes, with an elegant aromatic touch of Mediterranean herbs and fennel. A balanced wine, with character, delicate and silky in mouth but with body and personality.
name: Raimat Ventada Organic Garnacha Blanca Costers del Segre

description: There are fresh, tropical notes on the nose, a delicate florality and an enticing minerality on the finish.
name: Amodo Pecorino, IGT Terre di Chieti

description: Made entirely from Viura grapes, cool-fermented in stainless steel tanks and bottled young to preserve maximum aromas and crispness
name: Don Jacobo Rioja Viura Tempranillo Blanco, Bodegas Corral

description: Beautiful color of deep red with ruby brightness. The nose has aromas of red and black fruits, sweet cherry, freshness, floral notes and spices. A fleshy and structured wine with ample richness and truffle. A demonstration of power and complexity in a voluptuous harmony.
name: Chateau Vignot Saint-Emilion Grand Cru

description: A deep, rich colour. Sweet and silky on the palate with intense aromas of quince, ripe figs, raisins and plums.
name: Zuccardi Malamado Fortified Malbec, Mendoza

description: A bight and fresh red wine with aromas of red fruits and cherries. Balanced on the palate with a fine mouthfeel and soft tannins.
name: Oratoire St Pierre Vin Rouge

description: Intense ruby red with touches of violet. Fruity aromas of sweet cherries, red plums, orange peel and well-integrated oak. The aromas are mirrored by the palate's flavours. Round and soft tannins and subtle notes of sweet spices. A perfect companion to meat and aged cheese.
name: Arnegui Rioja Crianza

description: Made in a traditional, robust style using the Grenache, Cinsault and Syrah grape varieties and benefiting from ageing in large oak barrels called 'foudres'. A good example of this appellation produced by a top producer based in Châteauneuf-du-Pape.
name: Côtes du Rhône, Gentilhomme, Ogier

description: A soft and juicy rosé showing notes of strawberry and citrus.
name: El Velero Tempranillo Rosado, Valdepeñas

description: A blend of predominantly Sangiovese from central and southern Italy and Merlot from northern Italy. A soft, fruity red with juicy plum and cherry fruit and a light, soft finish.
name: Castelbello Rosso, Italia

description: This Tempranillo is tradtionally vinified; grapes are destemmed and crushed and the must undergoes a moderately long maceration. Following fermentation, the wine is aged for 18 months in American oak barrels, the wine is racked 2 or 3 times, clarifying it naturally, followed by ageing in bottles for 2 more years. The nose shows intense red fruit with ageing notes of truffle and vanilla.
name: Viña Pomal Centenario Rioja Reserva, Bodegas Bilbaínas

description: Verdejo is an aromatic grape variety, this example from central Spain shows floral notes with melon and citrus fruit on the palate.
name: Ayrum Verdejo Blanco, Valdepeñas

description: This Malbec has rich, opulent plum and blackberry flavours, rounded off with a hint of cocoa and vanilla. Medium-bodied, sweet and velvety wine, soft tannins and a pleasing finish.
name: Jam Shed Malbec, Mendoza

description: A fruit-forward, intense nose of ripe bramble fruits and cherries. Plush and juicy on the palate with soft tannins and a long, moreish finish of plums and spice.
name: Kylie Minogue Merlot Pays d'Oc

description: Red fruit aromas, with cedar and boldo notes. On the palate it is fresh and fruity, with flavors of cherry and hints of pepper and rosemary. Silky, with velvety tannins and great mouthfeel.
name: Primus Organic Carmenere, Colchagua Valley

description: Straight from the sun drenched shores of the Mediterranean This wine is soft, and light pink in color Beautiful floral and berry aromas awaken your senses with freshly picked summer peaches and strawberry cream dancing around your palate. This is the wine that patio and poolside sipping were made for!
name: Berne Romance IGP Mediterranee Rose 2020

description: Pale pink in colour, it has flavours of redcurrant, dried flowers and spices on the nose, with a subtle herbal quality. Dry, with bitter red fruit flavours, it has a firm finish with lingering herbal notes.
name: Chateau d'Esclans Whispering Angel Rosé 2021

description: Bico Amarelo or the yellow beak of the Black Bird which is found in Vinho Verde. A blend of Loureiro, Alvarinho and Avesso which was hand harvested from an historic property dating back to 1710. The wine has exuberant citrus and tropical aromas with a creamy texture that leaves a long lingering and refreshing finish.
name: Esporão Bico Amarelo, Vinho Verde

description: A true expression of Alentejo, a multi blend of mostly indigenous grape. Delicate pale salmon in appreance which shows of red berries, pomegranate and raspberries.
name: Herdade do Esporão Monte Velho Rosé, Alentejo

description: Direct delivery only
name: Monier de la Sizeranne Hermitage Red Vertical

description: As a land of contrasts, Languedoc-Roussillon gives birth to fruity wines, representative of exceptionally diverse terroirs. The palate is very aromatic, with a good level of acidity and a beautiful freshness that leads to a smooth finish. To be enjoyed at 12-13°C an an aperitif, with hot and salty starters, fish, poultry and fresh cheeses.
name: Gerard Bertrand 6eme Sens White, Occitanie

description: Ruby-red wine with good aromatic intensity, touches of roasted red pepper followed by a sweetness given by the red and black fruits and vanilla from ageing in French and American oak barrels. Round, soft palate, well-structured with fine tannins and generous fruit flavours.
name: Salentein Barrel Selection Cabernet Sauvignon, Uco Valley, Mendoza

description: Pale pastel pink. Fragrant and floral aromas- very inviting. .Elegant cool precision with easy going open and attractive fruitiness, Airy fresh palate that distinguishes good Provence rosé
name: Chateau d'Esclans Whispering Angel Rosé 2021

description: A delicate and refined bouquet, with notes of ripe fruit accompanied by hints of crusty bread, hazelnuts and floral aromas. The palate is dry, elegant and well-balanced, with intense fruity notes and nuances of vanilla and bread dough.
name: Ferrari Maximum Blanc de Blanc NV

description: From the natural fermentation of the DOC grapes grown in the Prosecco appellation in the hillside vineyards in the Veneto/Friuli region, this wonderful sparkling wine is a soft, flavourful wine with delicate bubbles. Lush summer strawberry and raspberries dominate the flavours.
name: Il Baco da Seta Prosecco Spumante Rosé DOC Extra Dry

description: Glera sourced from the hilly vineyards of Treviso is blended with a small amount of Pinot Noir from Fruili to make this beautiful, bright pink mother of pearl Prosecco. A fine and persistant perlarge (fizz), with a rich fruityness and hints of apple, white peach, citrus and wild strawberry.
name: Bottega Poeti Rosé Prosecco DOC

description: The 2014 is made from 90% Pinot Noir with 10% Pinot Meunier grapes. The grapes are grown on the Greyfriars estate, on the south-facing chalk-rich soils of the Hogs Back, close to Guildford in Surrey. The grapes are hand-harvested at full ripeness in early October. They are crushed and soaked with their skins for two hours before pressing to release the colour. One third of the grapes are fermented and the wine aged in used oak barriques, the remainder is fermented in stainless steel tanks. The wine spends about three years on the lees and it has a very small dosage of about 5g/l of sugar. It shows a delicate pale colour reminiscent of rosé from Provence, hints of vanilla and summer fruits on the nose with fresh, fruity berries on the palate.
name: Greyfriars Rosé Reserve, England

description: A floral and aromatic white wine with bright citrus fruit and white peaches and a crisp finish.
name: Alamos Torrontes

description: This delicious red wine has aromas of ripe dark berry fruit, including raspberry and currant flavours, with notes of sweet spice and a touch of leather. The finish is long and persistent with soft, sweet tannins.
name: Alamos Mountain Malbec

description: Freixenet Italian Rosé is fresh and fruity with the delicate aroma of red fruits and an elegant base of white flowers and apples. On the palate, the alluring, sweet red fruits blended in perfectly light, effervescent bubbles make this a delightful wine to be enjoyed on its own, or as a refreshing pairing with food.
name: Freixenet Sparkling Rosé, Italia

description: The vines covered in fog (“boira” in Catalan) are an unmistakeable landscape of Raimat. Dense and white, it can be seen practically every dawn and dusk on the estate. Cherry red with purple highlights that denote its youth. Prominent fruitiness of ripe blackberries and blueberries intermingled with violets and aniseed aromas.
name: Raimat Boira Organic Garnacha Catalunya

description: Made from 100% Marsanne hand-harvested from three different vineyards Le Méal, has old fluvio-glacial alluvial deposit soil with numerous deposits; Les Murets with granitic soils and alluvial deposits again granitic, Chante-Alouette is set on loess soil with a fine layer of clay and limestone. Michel Chapoutier chooses not to use Roussanne in the blend believing it to age too quickly. After pressing, the must is cold-settled for 48 hours. One third is vinified in big, 600-litre, wooden barrels which iare regularly stirred, and the rest in vats. The temperature of fermentation is regulated at around 19°C in order to develop the aromatic complexity of wines. Before bottling, the wine is checked by frequent tasting to determine the appropriate ageing period, usually from 10 to 12 months. Green-gold; the nose is complex and subtle, aromas of quince, walnut, honey, ginger and acacia; the minerally palate is weighty, elegant and lengthy.
name: Hermitage Blanc, Chante-Alouette, Organic, M.Chapoutier

description: The Cabernet Sauvignon, Tempranillo and Syrah grapes used in this blend are harvested at night, before being cooled further, prior to their individual fermentations a cooler fermentation generally results in a wine that shows more fresh-fruit flavours. The nose shows developed aromas of black fruits mingled with cocoa and mocha, underlain with spices including pepper, nutmeg and clove. Initial ripe-fruit on the palate is backed by a toasty note from a brief period of oak ageing; the finish shows both richness and freshness.
name: Vol d'Ánima de Raimat Tinto Costers del Segre Organic, Raimat

description: Cherry-red Tempranillo that shows strawberry and fruits of the forest on its smooth and velvety palate.
name: El Velero Tempranillo Tinto, Valdepeñas

description: This Chardonnay will delight you with its bright acidity and vivid aromas. Floral aromas of ripe apple, apricot, vanilla and a touch of spice combine with the rich apple flavours and crisp acidity. In the mouth, this wine is elegant and impressive, showing good acidity, structure and the fine balance characteristic of the terroir.
name: Errázuriz Max Reserva Chardonnay, Casablanca Valley

description: Garnet colour with violet notes. Aromatic on the nose with red fruits and liquorice leading to vanilla, cocoa and caramel. Rich and full on the palate with a long, fruit driven finish.
name: Cune Rioja Crianza

description: Cherry-red, very smooth with blackberry and plum fruit, the tannins are light and finish soft.
name: Ayrum Tempranillo Tinto, Valdepeñas

description: A beautifully pale pink colour, with a nose of wild strawberry and stone fruit, with delicate floral touches.
name: Vin du Can Pale Rose

description: Pale pink in colour, it has flavours of redcurrant, dried flowers and spices on the nose, with a subtle herbal quality. Dry, with bitter red fruit flavours, it has a firm finish with lingering herbal notes.
name: Chateau d'Esclans Whispering Angel Rose 2021

description: Pale pink in colour, it has flavours of redcurrant, dried flowers and spices on the nose, with a subtle herbal quality. Dry, with bitter red fruit flavours, it has a firm finish with lingering herbal notes.
name: Chateau d'Esclans Whispering Angel Rose 2021

description: Medium-bodied and well balanced with light, velvety tannins and juicy red cherry and plums.
name: Key Keg Italian Sangiovese Rubicone IGT

description: Delicate aromas of green apple and flowers with a well balanced crispy finish.
name: Key Keg Italian Trebbiano Rubicone IGT

description: A young and light sparkling wine, making it an ideal drink for any occasion. This has intense primary aromas of green apple and lemon which taste fresh, light and fruity.
name: Key Keg Italian Frizzante Veneto NV

description: The nose offers intense aromas of black stone fruit interwoven with notes of chocolate and sweet spice. The balanced acidity leads into a long, velvety finish.
name: Key Keg Argentinean Malbec

description: This bright, refreshing Sauvignon Blanc has aromas and flavours of apples, pears and gooseberries.
name: Key Keg New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc

description: Pale peach robe. A delicate wine with summery notes of nectarine combined with fresh strawberry and raspberry. Frank then round in the mouth, with a light finish. Fresh and pleasantly balanced. Ideal for lovers of fruty and gourmet wines, it is irresistible served with Mediterranean dishes.
name: Key Keg Chateau de Berne Esprit IGP Mediterranee Rose 2020

description: None
name: Champagne Palmer & Co Grands Terroirs 2012 (Gift-Box)

description: A unique project, this is all about bringing some British Sparkle to the normally still grape variety of Bacchus. Already favoured by many English wine producers for its ability to flourish in the UK, this adds an extra dimension to the grape variety. With characteristic aromas of pineapple, grapefruit and elderflower, the palate has a fine mousse, with tropical and floral flavours leading to a crisp texture and a refreshing finish.
name: Chapel Down Sparkling Bacchus, England

description: Fermented at low temperature and aged on its lees up until bottling to keep it fresh, this wine is stylish and racy, with the classic blackcurrant leaf and gooseberry character and minerally finish.
name: Sancerre, Les Collinettes, Joseph Mellot

description: Hand harvested grapes from a number of vineyards in Central Valley, with 10% oak used during fermentation. Following fermentation 20% of the wine was aged in French oak for 8 months. An intense purple with aromas of black and red fruits. Smooth tannins and an elegant structure on the palate with a long, juicy finish.
name: Santa Rita 120 Malbec, Central Valley

description: Fine and delicate white fruit notes like peach and cherry plum. Minerality and nice freshness on the palate.
name: Pinot Blanc Alsace Tradition Organic, Emile Beyer

description: This intensely purple Malbec has aromas of black and red fruits and a pleasing sensation on the palate with great volume, smooth tannins that lend elegant structure, and a persistent finish, making this an excellent wine for every occasion.
name: Santa Rita 120 Malbec, Central Valley

description: From the Marlborough region of the South Island, considered New Zealand?s premium white-wine region due to its cool climate and long hours of sunshine. This vibrant Sauvignon Blanc is driven by gooseberry, passion fruit, fresh lime and melon nuances.
name: Villa Maria Private Bin Sauvignon Blanc, Marlborough

description: Dark garnet and purple, roasted new oak with dark berries on the nose. Medium bodied structure with crushed berries, cassis and sweet spiciness to finish. Aged for 6 months in American oak barrels, 225ltr, and 6 months in bottle prior to release.
name: Don Jacobo Rioja Vendimia Secleccionada, Viticultura Ecológica Organic Bodegas Corral

description: Alexandre Bonnet is famous for its Pinot Noir style of Champagne which delivers richness and structure. The blend in the Grande Reserve Brut is 80% Pinot Noir and 20% Chardonnay and with 9g / litre of dosage it is dry on the palate. Flavours of white blossom and citrus provide freshness and fruity notes and our favourite food pairing would be rich fish such as salmon, tuna or scallops or a chicken salad in the summer would work brilliantly. A great house pour and be sure to serve chilled.
name: Champagne Bonnet Grande Réserve Brut

description: Alexandre Bonnet is famous for its Pinot Noir style of Champagne  which delivers richness and structure. The blend in the Grande Reserve Brut is 80% Pinot Noir and 20% Chardonnay and  with 9g / litre of dosage it is dry on the palate. Flavours of white blossom and citrus provide freshness and fruity notes.  A great house pour and be sure to serve chilled.
name: Champagne Bonnet Grande Réserve Brut

description: Alexandre Bonnet is famous for its Pinot Noir style of Champagne  which delivers richness and structure. The blend in the Grande Reserve Brut is 80% Pinot Noir and 20% Chardonnay and  with 9g / litre of dosage it is dry on the palate. Flavours of white blossom and citrus provide freshness and fruity notes.  A great house pour and be sure to serve chilled.
name: Champagne Bonnet Grande Réserve Brut

description: Made from hand-harvested Pinot Noir grown in the vineyards around the village of Les Riceys in the Cote des Bar region of Champagne, this is a rose that has a rich salmon pink colour and a delightful nose of red berries.  Dry, yet full of raspberry and black currant flavours, it is delicious with roasted poultry and quite delightful with desserts such as pancakes with strawberries and almonds or perhaps a fruit tart with raspberry coulis.
name: Champagne Bonnet Perle Rosé Brut

description: Pinot Noir comes to the fore again in this champagne which delivers a complexity of flavours from grapes grown mainly in the house's own vineyards around the village of Les Riceys. Flavours of gooseberry and morello cherry blend seamlessly with fresh quince and brioche. This champagne matches brilliantly with shellfish such as crab and lobster yet it also makes for the perfect aperitif at a summer garden party where you might serve crunchy crudites such as carrot, cucumber and celery sticks with salty dips, hard cheeses such as pecorino, asparagus with hollandaise or smoked salmon served on blinis.
name: Champagne Bonnet Blanc de Noirs Brut

description: A ripe, biscuity Champagne with a fine mousse and a long, elegant finish. A blend of 50% Chardonnay, 30% Pinot Noir and 20% Pinot Meunier gives backbone and complexity. A family-run Champagne house founded in 1920 and today run by José and his brother Pierre Bouché.
name: Bouché Père et Fils Cuvée Réservé Brut

description: A ripe, biscuity Champagne with a fine mousse and a long, elegant finish. A blend of 50% Chardonnay, 30% Pinot Noir and 20% Pinot Meunier gives backbone and complexity. A family-run Champagne house founded in 1920 and today run by José and his brother Pierre Bouché.
name: Bouché Père et Fils Cuvée Réservé Brut

description: This pink Champagne is made from 50% Pinot Noir, 40% Chardonnay and 10% Pinot Meunier. The red grapes are gently crushed to extract a light red coloured juice. The vinification of each variety and parcel is done separately in small tanks before blending and bottling and then aged for three years in the cellars.
name: Bouché Père et Fils Brut Rosé

description: Selected exclusively from Grand Cru vineyards, this superb Champagne offers exceptional quality for less cost than many non-vintages! 50% Chardonnay, 30% Pinot Noir and 20% Pinot Meunier. The wine is now fully mature and drinking magnificently. Fantastic value!
name: Bouché Père et Fils Grande Réserve Brut

description: Made exclusively from Chardonnay and aged for a minimum 3 years in bottle, this is very much an on-trend style of Champagne that is starting to appeal to the masses as well as the connoisseur. With aromas of lemon, honey and hints of white peach it delivers fresh clean flavours and is a famous match with oysters or caviar and it also enhances calamari dishes and indian curries.
name: Bouché Père et Fils Blanc de Blanc

description: A very dry yet very complex Champagne made from red grapes (80% Pinot Noir and 20% Pinot Meunier) and aged for 6 years with a small proportion in wood. Key flavours include butter from the oak, yellow plums, melon and honey. Winemaker Nicholas Bouche is particularly proud of this creation and recommends pairing with light meats such as partridge, veal or pork.
name: Bouché Père et Fils Blanc de Noirs Zero Dosage

description: Christophe Rapeneau, the Oenologist and Cellar Master at Champagne Martel has balanced acidity and fruit extremely well in this Brut Champagne which includes hints of banana and vanilla as well as the more typical aromas of citrus and white blossom.  Using all three grapes varieties with majority Pinot Noir it matches well with lamb shank or camembert cheese.
name: Champagne Martel Prestige Brut

description: Salmon-pink in colour this elegant Rose brut exudes delicious aromas and flavours of crushed strawberries and cherries. It's a perfect match for serrano ham, sole or fresh fruit salad and makes for a superb summer wedding welcome drink.
name: Champagne Martel Rosé Brut

description: A competitively priced vintage Champagne showing all the classic attributes    Golden in colour, fine bubbles, fresh on the nose yet with a complex palate showing nuts, vanilla, honey and almonds. Matured in the 15th century cellars just a few miles from Epernay, this Champagne  really is a treat with fois gras or perhaps ducks breast with figs and almonds would really do it justice.
name: Champagne Martel Vintage Brut

description: A light, fresh, vigorously youthful Champagne with a fine, elegant, slightly lemony nose, lively mousse and long, crisp palate. Outstanding value and consistently good. There is a high percentage of Pinot grapes (both Noir and Meunier) in the blend.
name: Louis Dornier et Fils Brut

description: A light, fresh, vigorously youthful Champagne with a fine, elegant, slightly lemony nose, lively mousse and long, crisp palate. Outstanding value and consistently good. There is a high percentage of Pinot grapes (both Noir and Meunier) in the blend.
name: Louis Dornier et Fils Brut

description: Pinot dominated, amber-coloured rosé with classic summer-fruit aromas, backed by fresh citrus and apple-pastry notes on the palate.
name: Louis Dornier et Fils Brut Rosé

description: One of the Louis Roederer portfolio of wineries, Deutz Champagne is made in the Ay region of Champagne not far from Epernay. The fine effervescence of this Brut Classic Champagne suggests lots of lees ageing and aromas include hawthorn and white flowers while on the palate hints of toast, marzipan and ripe pears can be tasted. A very rewarding full bodied yet elegant Champagne which highlights the freshness of Chardonnay and the richness of Pinot Noir.
name: Champagne Deutz Brut Classic

description: The addition of 8% Pinot Noir red wine creates a beautiful delicate salmon pink colour in this quite spectacular Rose Champagne. It spends 3 years on the lees before resting for a further 6 months following degorgement. Aromas of wild strawberries, cranberries and raspberries are harmonised to match with smoked salmpon, cold cut meats and fruit salad.
name: Champagne Deutz Rosé

description: Aged for at least 5 years on the lees this 2008 vintage Blanc de Blanc really does reflect the love and passion afforded during the vinification process and subsequent storage in the Deutz cellars in Ay.  Michael Davesne the chef de cave who joined the company in 2003 continues to oversee prodction and ensure consistency. It is made from 100% Chardonnay and on the palate delivers buttery apple notes and hints of citrus and green fruit. Perfect with fruits de la mer and creamy cheeses.
name: Champagne Deutz Blanc de Blanc

description: The Grand Brut has fine bubbles, which release deliciously floral, slightly honeyed fruit aromas. It shows fresh fruit such as white peach on the palate, and has an elegant finish.
name: Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut

description: The Grand Brut has fine bubbles, which release deliciously floral, slightly honeyed fruit aromas. It shows fresh fruit such as white peach on the palate, and has an elegant finish.
name: Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut

description: The Grand Brut has fine bubbles, which release deliciously floral, slightly honeyed fruit aromas. It shows fresh fruit such as white peach on the palate, and has an elegant finish.
name: Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut

description: Herve Deschamps selects aroud 30 wines to make up the composition of the Blason Rosé and creates a Champagne which has a luminous rose colour with glints of pale orange. Perrier-Jouët Blason Rosé unleashes intense aromas of ripe red and black fruit – strawberry, raspberry and blackberry – complemented by a hint of exotic pomegranate. Lush and lively on the palate, it lingers into a full, generous finish.
name: Perrier-Jouët Blason Rosé

description: The famous Emile Gallé designed Art Nouveau bottle with its painted anemones has to be one of the most beautiful presentations on the market. The equally impressive contents have the classic elegance and finesse of great Champagne. Made from a blend of approximately 50% Chardonnay, 45% Pinot Noir and 5% Pinot Meunier sourced from top vineyard sites such as Cramant, aged for a minimum of five years, usually much longer, prior to release.
name: Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque Brut

description: The famous Emile Gallé designed Art Nouveau bottle with its painted anemones has to be one of the most beautiful presentations on the market. The equally impressive contents have the classic elegance and finesse of great Champagne. Made from a blend of approximately 50% Chardonnay, 45% Pinot Noir and 5% Pinot Meunier sourced from top vineyard sites such as Cramant, aged for a minimum of five years, usually much longer, prior to release.
name: Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque Brut

description: Very elegant aromas of strawberry and redcurrant with notes of honey and freshly baked bread on a balanced and complex finish. The blend is 45% Chardonnay mostly from Cramant and Avize, 50% Pinot Noir mostly from Mailly and Verzy and 5% Pinot Meunier, about 8% of the blend is red wine from Ambonnay and Aÿ. Presented in the famous Emile Gallé designed Art Nouveau bottle with its painted anemones, this time in clear glass to let the wine's colour shine through. Very limited availability.
name: Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque Rosé Brut

description: Family run, steeped in tradition and famous for its location in the Grand Cru village of Ay in the Vallee de la Marne, Maison Bollinger make wines that are powerful, sophisticated and complex. Since 1911 this Special Cuvee has always been "special". Using grapes from over 85% Grands and Premiers Crus, roasted apples and peaches combine with pear, brioche and walnuts to create the perfect pairing with prawn, crayfish, parmesan and good cured ham.
name: Bollinger Special Cuvée Brut NV

description: Made from mainly Pinot Noir and them some Chardonnay and Pinot Meunier, it is elegant and seductive, with juicy summer red berries, shortbread biscuit and a soft texture. Refined and delicate with long lasting creamy bubbles.
name: Bollinger Rosé Brut

description: One of the greatest and most well known vintage Champagnes , it is the embodiment of the carefully preserved traditional expertise of Bollinger. Fermented entirely in oak barrels to add complexity, no less than 18 crus, from mainly Ay and Vezenay for the majority Pinot Noir and Le Mesnil sur Ogier and Cramant for the Chardonnay. These are blended to create flavours of wild peach, plum and orange peel along with saffron, a creamy effervescence and fresh structure with a gentle saline finish. Scallops tartare, grilled lobster and cured meats make for a magnificent pairing.
name: Bollinger La Grande Année Brut

description: Light, delicate and elegant; dry, fresh and balanced with a green fruit and citrus character. Produced from first pressings, with up to 20% of reserve wine used to ensure consistency of style from year to year. The blend is 40% Chardonnay, 35% Pinot Noir, 25% Pinot Meunier; it receives three to four years ageing prior to release, this results in subtle hints of biscuit and brioche.
name: Taittinger Brut Réserve, NV

description: Light, delicate and elegant; dry, fresh and balanced with a green fruit and citrus character. Produced from first pressings, with up to 20% of reserve wine used to ensure consistency of style from year to year. The blend is 40% Chardonnay, 35% Pinot Noir, 25% Pinot Meunier; it receives three to four years ageing prior to release, this results in subtle hints of biscuit and brioche.
name: Taittinger Brut Réserve NV

description: Light, delicate and elegant; dry, fresh and balanced with a green fruit and citrus character. Produced from first pressings, with up to 20% of reserve wine used to ensure consistency of style from year to year. The blend is 40% Chardonnay, 35% Pinot Noir, 25% Pinot Meunier; it receives three to four years ageing prior to release, this results in subtle hints of biscuit and brioche.
name: Taittinger Brut Réserve, NV

description: The perfect accompaniment to afternoon tea, Tattinger Nocturne enjoys an additional dosage of sugar (20g / litre Vs 10g / litre for the Brut) which gives a richer texture without being as sweet as a demi-sec. The grapes come from 40 different premium vineyards which facilitate year on year consistency. The finish on the palate is mellow, soft and with flavours of apple and apricot pastries.
name: Taittinger Nocturne Sec

description: Made from a blend of Chardonnay, Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier sourced from around 40 villages; the wine is a delicate pale rose-pink with salmon-pink highlights. The nose shows aromas of small red fruits such as raspberry; the palate is fresh, delicately flavoured with a touch of richness.
name: Pommery Brut Rosé Apanage

description: This lively pink Champagne has crushed wild raspberry and cherry notes, with a creamy texture and subtle toasty flavours on the finish.
name: Taittinger Prestige Brut Rosé

description: The Taittinger Vintage Brut is exclusively produced from first press wines from Grands Crus and Premier Cru vineyards, Aged in the cellars for 5 years. The vivid, lively nose exudes fruity and floral aromas giving way to almond notes with a hint of brioche. The palate is crisp and wonderfully precise. The finish is complex, with both elegance and length.
name: Taittinger Brut Vintage

description: Made exclusively from Chardonnay grapes from Côte des Blancs Grand Cru villages. For those who appreciate the sublime elegance and lightness of this style of Champagne, this is the ultimate goal. Finely aromatic, rich and creamy; this wine is a perfect marriage of delicacy and intensity with ripe lemon, vanilla tart, toasted almond and lime blossom.
name: Taittinger Comtes de Champagne Blanc de Blancs Brut

description: A rare and wonderful wine, only made in small quantities in exceptional years. It combines the classic elegance of Chardonnay with the fullness and power of Pinot Noir. The grapes are sourced from only Grand Cru vineyards, and 12% of the red wine used in the blend comes from the village of Bouzy. it has flavours and aromas of wild strawberries, morello cherries and blackcurrants combined with almonds and licqurice, it is complex and rich. Only made in small quantities in exceptional years.
name: Taittinger Comtes de Champagne Brut Rosé

description: The essence of the Pommery style liveliness, fresh, finesse. Delicate red berries on the nose with a blend that emphasises Chardonnay on the palate; flavours of citrus and white flowers dominate in a rich yet elegant wine.
name: Pommery Brut Royal

description: This delicately pale rose-pink Champagne shows aromas of small red fruits such as raspberry and redcurrant. The palate is fresh and elegantly flavoured with a lengthy, flavoursome finish. Made from a blend of Chardonnay, Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier sourced from around 40 villages.
name: Pommery Brut Rosé Royal

description: This cuvée has been crafted from a meticulous selection of Chardonnay grapes that provide a freshness and a rich complexity. The aromas of citrus fruits and fresh apple lead on to the subtle flavor of yellow grapefruit.
name: Pommery Blanc de Blancs

description: Owned by giant Champagne House Moët & Chandon, Mercier is the brand leader in France. The style of this popular Champagne is quite different from that of its ‘big brother’. The fuller, fatter style reflects the predominance of black grapes in the cuvée.
name: Mercier Brut

description: A highly approachable wine, the Mercier Brut Rose is mouthwatering, soft and fresh, with vibrant flavours of sweet wild forest berries and hints of fresh baked pasty.
name: Mercier Brut Rosé

description: Moët Impérial is the House’s iconic champagne. Created in 1869, it embodies their unique style,distinguished by its bright fruitiness, seductive palate and elegant maturity. Created from more than 100 different wines specially selected to enhance its maturity, complexity and consistancy. A sparkling bouquet of vibrant apple and citrus fruit, mineral nuances, white flowers, brioche and nuts.
name: Moët & Chandon Brut Impérial NV

description: Moët Ice Impérial is the first champagne especially created to be enjoyed over ice. A new champagne experience combining fun, fresh and free spirit while remaining true to the Moët & Chandon style. Ice Impérial has powerful aroma of mango and guava with sumptuous stonefruits. A voluptuous fresh fruit salad flavour combines with sweetness of caramel and quince on the palate followed by a refreshing acidity of grapefruit and ginger.
name: Moët & Chandon Ice Impérial NV

description: This multi-vintage blend has vibrant flavours of citrus fruits, creamy texture and a long, silky finish. Made exclusively from grapes picked from Premier and Grand Cru vineyards. Very limited availability.
name: Armand de Brignac Brut

description: Ace of Spades Brut Rosé is a multi-vintage blend of wines which includes an unusual oak-aged dosage element. All grapes used are hand-selected from Premier and Grand Cru vineyards. It has a rich bouquet of red fruits with subtle smoky notes. It is fresh and full-bodied on the palate with strawberries, blackcurrant, with a lingering, complex finish.
name: Armand de Brignac Brut Rosé

description: This Champagne comes from the purest grape juice allowing Laurent-Perrier to craft “La Cuvée”, a champagne of great finesse and a beautiful freshness obtained after a long ageing process in their cellars. Laurent-Perrier’s style and personality are defined by its very high proportion of Chardonnay. Purity, freshness and elegance – with notes of citrussy grapefruit and orange blossom.
name: Laurent-Perrier La Cuvée Brut NV

description: Pioneer of the Brut Nature category, Laurent-Perrier Ultra Brut is a wine with no added sugar. With 55% Chardonnay and 45% Pinot Noir this wine displays aromas of citrus, apples, peach, honeysuckle and iodine. It is an airy and delicate wine with great lenght and purity.
name: Laurent-Perrier Cuvée Ultra Brut NV

description: Elegant and refined style of Champagne with candied lemon and orange peel, subtle aromas of pineapple, apricot and almonds, freshly-baked brioche and long tasting delicate bubbles.
name: Laurent-Perrier Vintage

description: 100% Chardonnay from the best crus of the Cote de Blanc and the Mountains de Reims. A blanc de blanc without any dosage. The wine has a white gold colour with a fine sparkle, it is balanced with a fresh finish and notes of Lemon. The nose displays minerality and hints of citrus.
name: Laurent-Perrier Blanc de Blanc Brut Nature

description: A blend of 66% Pinot Noir and 34% Chardonnay; it spends an average of four years on its lees. Light and lively nose with aromas of ripe stone fruit; a full bodied palate with flavours of tarte tatin and brioche dipped in honey.
name: Louis Roederer Brut Vintage

description: Louis Roederer's most famous wine was created in 1876 to satisfy the demanding tastes of Tsar Alexander II. Expect to detect delicate aromas of brioche, nuts balanced with notes of lemon peel, nectarine and peach. Cristal is a wine that keeps well it can be conserved for over twenty years without losing its freshness and character.
name: Louis Roederer Cristal Brut

description: A light pink, displaying wild strawberry and raspberry aromas which are balanced on a light and lively palate.
name: Heidsieck & Co. Monopole Rosé Top Brut

description: A Champagne cuvée reserved exclusively for the on-trade. Crafted using the non-malolactic method, the wine is aged for about 40 months on the lees. Distinctively crisp and zesty, the palate shows elegant fruit and the finish plenty of freshness.
name: Lanson Père et Fils Brut NV

description: A young, lively style of non-vintage which has an attractive lemon and green apple character, coupled with a slightly biscuity aroma. Made from grapes sourced exclusively from Premier and Grand Cru vineyards. Lanson are one of the few houses which do not use any malolactic fermentation of the still wine. The result is a wine with great freshness.
name: Lanson Black Label Brut NV

description: Faithful to the Lanson house style, this champagne is fresh, zesty and refreshing but has a softer, off-dry character. Aromas of white flowers and summer pear with mineral notes; a blend of about 40% of Chardonnay and Pinot Noir, and 20% Pinot Meunier.
name: Lanson Brut White Label Sec NV

description: Pale pink with orange highlights, aromas of honey, flowers and fresh berries on the nose; fresh and vibrant, with elegant, restrained creamy fruit on the palate.
name: Lanson Brut Rosé NV

description: Made by Champagne’s second oldest house, Chanoine Frères, which dates back to 1730. The Tsarine house pays tribute to Russian high society of the 18th century; the bottle design reflects the spires of St Basil’s cathedral in Moscow. A blend of 34% Chardonnay, 33% Pinot Noir and 33% Pinot Meunier, two thirds of which goes through a malolactic fermentation. Gradually presenting aromas of lime blossom and lemon grass, with lighter notes of bitter orange and quince. This cuvée has a citrus freshness to the palate with hints of white peach.
name: Tsarine Cuvée Premium Brut

description: A salmon-tinted rosé made from a blend of 34% Chardonnay, 33% Pinot Noir and 33% Pinot Meunier. Only two thirds of the blend goes through a malolactic fermentation; the third that doesn’t contributes greatly to the palate’s freshness. Wild strawberry and blackberry aromas greet the nose, this is followed by an impression of red fruits and cream on the palate. The bottle presentation reflects Tsarine’s longestablished relationship with Russia, mimicking the spires of St Basil’s cathedral in Moscow.
name: Tsarine Rosé Brut

description: A balanced blend of the three champagne grapes aged for a minimum of 24 months to ensure structure and freshness. On the nose, notes of white flowers, fresh fruit compote and hints of brioche. On the palate, there are hints of vanilla, white fruits and gingerbread.
name: Champagne de Castellane Brut NV

description: A rich, aromatic palate of white fruits, pears, baked apples and apricots, with subtle notes of honey, hazelnuts, dried currants and brioche. The finish is long, harmonious and structured, with a beautiful freshness.
name: Palmer & Co Brut Reserve NV

description: Intense aromas of wild strawberries with notes of blackcurrants and redcurrants, and delicate spicy notes of vanilla and cinnamon. The mousse is intense, creamy and persistent. The palate is fresh and delicate with fine bubbles. The finish is elegant and fruity.
name: Palmer & Co Rosé Solera NV

description: A rich, aromatic palate of white fruits, pears, baked apples and apricots, with subtle notes of honey, hazelnuts, dried currants and brioche. The finish is long, harmonious and structured, with a beautiful freshness.
name: Palmer & Co Brut Reserve NV

description: An elegant and complex 100% Chardonnay, displaying subtle aromas of citrus fruit, white flowers and almonds, purity and finesse. Silky on the palate with fresh mineral notes and delicate creamy bubbles.
name: Palmer & Co Blanc de Blancs NV

description: This rose is a unique vinification with a Solera of red base wines that started over 40 years ago. Palmer Rosé Solera is a rosé champagne combining exceptional fruitiness and delicate notes of spice.
name: Palmer & Co Rosé Solera NV

description: The Lanson Blanc de Blancs magnifies the freshness of the Lanson House style with the finesse of the Chardonnay grapes. The nose is a combination of lime blossom and pear with a delicate honey finish.
name: Lanson Le Blanc de Blancs Brut NV

description: Intense aromas of wild strawberries with notes of blackcurrants and redcurrants, and delicate spicy notes of vanilla and cinnamon. The mousse is intense, creamy and persistent. The palate is fresh and delicate with fine bubbles. The finish is elegant and fruity.
name: Palmer & Co Rosé Solera NV

description: A rich, aromatic palate of white fruits, pears, baked apples and apricots, with subtle notes of honey, hazelnuts, dried currants and brioche. The finish is long, harmonious and structured, with a beautiful freshness.
name: Palmer & Co Brut Reserve NV

description: An explosion of fruit aromas on the nose apricot, pear, mango and caramelized pineapple, with a subtle touch of citrus and pink grapefruit. This wine is ample on the palate and displays a very elegant and refreshing acidity, which enhances the delicate, sweet and rich character of Nectar Reserve.
name: Palmer & Co Nectar Reserve NV

description: A blend of 66% Pinot Noir and 34% Chardonnay; it spends an average of four years on its lees. Golden straw colour with bronze highlights; light and lively nose with the fragrance of ripe fruit; warm succulent palate recalling flavours of tarte tatin and brioche dipped in honey.
name: Louis Roederer Cristal 2004 (Handpicked Only)

description: A rich, aromatic palate of white fruits, pears, baked apples and apricots, with subtle notes of honey, hazelnuts, dried currants and brioche. The finish is long, harmonious and structured, with a beautiful freshness.
name: Palmer & Co Brut Reserve NV (Gift Boxed)

description: An elegant and complex 100% Chardonnay, displaying subtle aromas of citrus fruit, white flowers and almonds, purity and finesse. Silky on the palate with fresh mineral notes and delicate creamy bubbles.
name: Palmer & Co Blanc de Blancs NV

description: This wine is fresh and fruity, with notes of peach, apricot and hints of pink grapefruit and redcurrant. Elegant on the palate, it combines structure, finesse and freshness.
name: Palmer & Co Blanc de Noirs NV

description: Intense aromas of wild strawberries with notes of blackcurrants and redcurrants, and delicate spicy notes of vanilla and cinnamon. The mousse is intense, creamy and persistent. The palate is fresh and delicate with fine bubbles. The finish is elegant and fruity.
name: Palmer & Co Rose Solera NV (Gift Boxed)

description: Complex and elegant, it has ripe pear, peach and nectarine aromas, fresh white flowers, fragrant hazelnut biscuit and pastries, persistent soft bubbles and a unique harmony between freshness and richness.
name: Moët & Chandon Grand Vintage Brut

description: A delicate rose champagne with fruity and floral aromas, and mouthwatering flavours of red berries and redcurrant.
name: Champagne de Castellane Rosé NV

description: This rose Champagne has lively, intense aromas of red fruits such as wild strawberry and raspberry with hints of rose and peach. Made using 85% Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier grapes and 15% Chardonnay.
name: Moët & Chandon Rosé Impérial NV

description: Made using 85% Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier grapes and about 15% Chardonnay, with a 9 g/l dosage. It has a lively, intense aromas of red fruits such as wild strawberry and raspberry with hints of rose and peach.
name: Moët & Chandon Rosé Impérial (Mini-Moët Rosé)

description: Lanson Le Black Reserve was created in 2013 to produce an exceptional Non-vintage Champagne combining freshness, complexity and fullness. At least 70% of the grapes are Grands or Premiers Cru and the wine is aged for 5 years initially. The nose combines pear, spice and honey which leads onto a long, intense pallet.
name: Lanson Le Black Reserve Brut NV

description: A balanced blend of the three champagne grapes aged for a minimum of 24 months to ensure structure and freshness. On the nose, notes of white flowers, fresh fruit compote and hints of brioche. On the palate, there are hints of vanilla, white fruits and gingerbread.
name: Champagne de Castellane Brut NV

description: This Champagne has a pure amber colour, with fine and tiny bubbles. It develops an  aromatic complexity of fresh fruits, like pears and grapes, followed by dried fruits and finally, candied fruit notes. A touch of buttered and toasty notes follow, and it has a smooth finish.
name: Palmer & Co Amazone de Palmer NV

description: Well known for both its full-bodied and consistant style, with aromas and flavours of baked apple, biscuit and brioche. A black grape dominated blend, using 50% Pinot Noir and 20% Pinot Meunier together with 30% Chardonnay. A blend of over 50 crus, mostly Premier and Grand Cru, with over 25% reserve wines.
name: Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label Brut NV

description: Nectar Impérial is a delicious demi-sec expression of the Moët & Chandon style. A rich bouquet with bursts of exotic fruits, stonefruits and a slight hint of vanilla. There is a density of exotic fruits on the pallet (pineapple, mango) the silky firmness of stonefruits (mirabelle plum, apricot) and the freshness of grapefruit notes.
name: Moet & Chandon Nectar Impérial

description: The first Champagne created expressly to be served over ice. This wine is sweet and rich with peach, apricot, pineapple and mango. It has a hint of almond and a creamy texture.
name: Veuve Clicquot Rich NV

description: Only made in the best years this wine has intense aromas of candied citrus, roast pear, hazelnut and almond. A portion of the wine is aged in oak adding subtle vanilla and toasty notes.
name: Veuve Clicquot Vintage Réserve Brut

description: Moët Impérial is the House’s iconic champagne. Created in 1869, it embodies their unique style,distinguished by its bright fruitiness, seductive palate and elegant maturity. Created from more than 100 different wines specially selected to enhance its maturity, complexity and consistancy. A sparkling bouquet of vibrant apple and citrus fruit, mineral nuances, white flowers, brioche and nuts
name: Moet & Chandon Brut Impérial NV

description: Moët Impérial is the House’s iconic champagne. Created in 1869, it embodies their unique style,distinguished by its bright fruitiness, seductive palate and elegant maturity. Created from more than 100 different wines specially selected to enhance its maturity, complexity and consistancy. A sparkling bouquet of vibrant apple and citrus fruit, mineral nuances, white flowers, brioche and nuts.
name: Moet & Chandon Brut Impérial NV

description: Round and rich with a complex array of honeyed, nutty aromas, such as crushed almond and freshly baked brioche. Made from a 50/50 blend of Chardonnay and Pinot Noir sourced from 12 Grand Cru vineyards.
name: Laurent-Perrier Grand Siecle No25

description: From a Champagne house with a long and distinguished history dating back to 1729, making it the oldest still producing wine. The palate is rich and creamy with a touch of butterscotch, brioche, white fleshed pear and aromas of white flowers.
name: R de Ruinart Brut NV

description: This golden pink Champagne shows aromas of cherry and red-berries on the nose; the palate is well-balanced with vibrant and refreshing fruit character. A blend of 45% Chardonnay and 55% Pinot Noir.
name: Ruinart Rosé NV

description: Moët Impérial is the House’s iconic champagne. Created in 1869, it embodies their unique style,distinguished by its bright fruitiness, seductive palate and elegant maturity. Created from more than 100 different wines specially selected to enhance its maturity, complexity and consistancy. A sparkling bouquet of vibrant apple and citrus fruit, mineral nuances, white flowers, brioche and nuts
name: Moët & Chandon Brut Impérial (Mini-Moët)

description: Small batch artisanal gin, created using the perfect balance of London dry gin and Japanese botanicals and a touch of Junmai Sake! Made in Japan at the Kaikyo distillery. Delicious in a classic G&T, garnished with grapefruit or yuzu
name: 135 East Gin Hyogo

description: Named after the year it was created, 1800 Tequila is made from pure, 100% blue agave grown on family owned ranches and bottled in Jalisco, Mexico. Each bottle of 1800 Tequila is double-distilled and matured in French and American oak barrels for superior drinkability.
name: 1800 Silver Tequila

description: An apple aperitif made in Normandy by combining cider and calvados. Perfect paired with premium tonic or Fever-Tree White Grape and Apricot Soda, garnished with Rosemary and Lemon Peel. This serve is known as Pomme Spritz. A premium alternative to Aperol Spritz.
name: 30&40 Double Jus Apple Aperitif

description: 42 Below vodka is made with the pure softness of New Zealand spring water. It has a smooth rich spirit with soft aromas of aniseed, a toasty grainy flavour of finest wheat, and a long, lingering finish with a hint of sweetness.
name: 42 Below Vodka

description: 6 O'clock Gin's London Dry is a strikingly smooth gin with a clean flavour led by juniper. The smoothness flows from their unique double-sphere copper still, the carefully selected botanicals and their distillers craft. Only the pure heart of each run makes the cut. Elegant and crisp in the mouth with refreshing and balanced notes of citrus, elderflower and winter savory. This is a gin lover's gin.
name: 6 O'clock Gin

description: 6 O'clock Damson is a fantastically fruity gin made in small batches using handpicked whole British fruit. Time works wonders which is why they leave their gin to slowly mature on masses of luscious Damsons for at least 6 months. The resulting gin strikes a delicious balance between tart fruitiness and warming spice, perfect with tonic, ginger ale or in cocktails.
name: 6 O'clock Gin Damson

description: A full-flavoured artisanal cachaça with an intense fruit/vegetal nose, fresh sugar cane and stone fruits taste and a smooth dry finish.
name: Abelha Silver Organic Cachaca

description: The gin is based on the London Dry style but we call it a "Welsh Dry Gin". It is made using Welsh water from the mountains around Aber Falls. Botanicals used are very traditional, providing a classic juniper forward gin, with a layered citrus edge and a slightly spicy and sweet backbone.
name: Aber Falls Dry Gin, 70cl

description: Inspired by the warming, homely flavours of rhubarb & ginger crumble, a classic taste that brings back fond memories of Sunday dinners and family gatherings.
name: Aber Falls Rhubarb & Ginger Welsh Gin

description: This amber gold whisky has an aroma of vanilla and toffee, candied citrus fruits, and fig and sultana; all balanced with a gentle hint of clove.
name: Aber Falls Single Malt Welsh Whisky

description: "This small batch Welsh gin is inspired by ancient flavours that date back to Druid times and is produced at the distillery in Abergwyngregyn, using water from Rhaeadr Fawr - the Aber Falls waterfall. Simply the finest gin Aber Falls has produced to date."
name: Aber Falls Small Batch Gin

description: Aberfeldy is famous for its particular honeyed notes - they come from the patient process of longer fermentation, which allows for more flavour development. We then distil in copper pot stills, handmade by the same family for over a century, and age to perfection in oak casks.
name: Aberfeldy 12 Year Old

description: Ableforth’s Cherry Brandy is made simply with cherries & high quality brandy, suitable for enjoying neat or over ice Nose Intense swirls of cherries with notes of almonds, cinnamon & a blossoming, floral depth Palate Rich & syrupy. The cherry is joined by damson, plum & hints of allspice Finish As the cherries recede, deep nutmeg notes appear
name: Ableforth's Cherry Brandy

description: Every single drop of ABSOLUT is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden. Absolut Citron is smooth and mellow with a fresh, fruity lemon and lime character and a note of lemon peel. Serving suggestion Absolut Citron mixes well with a wide range of fruit juices and mixers. Try in a Cosmopolitan or mixed simply with tonic and lemon.
name: Absolut Citron

description: Absolut Elyx is is distilled in a vintage copper rectification still from 1929 in small batches using wheat sourced locally from the nearby Rabelof estate. It's a clean tasting vodka with a soft and silky mouthfeel. Serving suggestion Absolut Elyx is perfect for your martinis, on the rocks or in any of your favourite vodka cocktails.
name: Absolut Elyx

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden. Absolut Kurant is smooth and mellow with a fruity blackcurrant character and a hint of tartness. Serving suggestion Absolut Kurant mixes well with a wide range of fruit juices and mixers. Try in a Cosmopolitan or mixed simply with apple juice.
name: Absolut Kurant

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden. Absolut Lime is fresh and zingy, bursting with notes of freshly pressed lime. Serving suggestion Simply pour over ice, add soda and garnish with lime or use in any of your favourite vodka cocktails.
name: Absolut Lime

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden, using the finest Swedish winter wheat, exceptionally pure water and a state of the art production process. Absolut Mandrin is complex, smooth and mellow with a fruity mandarin and orange character mixed with a note of orange peel.
name: Absolut Mandarin

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden. Absolut Mango is full-bodied and juicy with a character of ripe mango and notes of tropical fruits. Serving suggestion Mix Absolut Mango with pineapple juice, soda, a squeeze of lime and garnish with a slice of mango or use it in any of your favourite vodka cocktails.
name: Absolut Mango 40%

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden, Absolut has a unique, distinctive grainy taste and delivers a smooth, elegant finish. Serving suggestion simply pour over ice, add soda and garnish with lime or use in any of your favourite vodka cocktails. Try it in an Eldeflower Collins or an Espresso Martini.
name: Absolut Original

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden, Absolut has a unique, distinctive grainy taste and delivers a smooth, elegant finish. Serving suggestion simply pour over ice, add soda and garnish with lime or use in any of your favourite vodka cocktails. Try it in an Eldeflower Collins or an Espresso Martini.
name: Absolut Original 70cl

description: Every single drop of Absolut is produced in Ahus, southern Sweden, Absolut has a unique, distinctive grainy taste and delivers a smooth, elegant finish. Serving suggestion simply pour over ice, add soda and garnish with lime or use in any of your favourite vodka cocktails. Try it in an Eldeflower Collins or an Espresso Martini.
name: Absolut Original Miniatures

description: Absolut Pears is fresh and delicate with a smack of mellow pears and a long fruity aftertaste. Absolut Pears is made exclusively from natural ingredients, and unlike other flavoured vodkas, it doesn't contain any added sugar making it perfect for mixing.
name: Absolut Pears 38%

description: Absolut Raspberri is rich and intense with the fresh and fruity taste of ripened raspberries harvested in the Swedish hillsides. It’s made from natural flavours and doesn't contain any added sugar. It can be enjoyed neat or added to a wide selection of drinks and cocktails.
name: Absolut Raspberri Vodka

description: Absolut Vanilia is perfect for those with a sweet tooth or who like to experiment with flavours. It’s made from natural flavours and doesn't contain any added sugar. Characterised by its distinct taste of vanilla, notes of butterscotch and hints of dark chocolate, it can be enjoyed neat or added to a wide selection of drinks and cocktails.
name: Absolut Vanilia Vodka

description: Absolut brings you that watermelon sweetness with zero added sugar, the perfect summer flavour to be enjoyed with friends. Deliciously smooth and satisfying, with a naturally refreshing watermelon taste. For a simple serve try Absolut Watermelon and Lemonade garnished with a slice of Lime or try in a Spritz with fresh watermelon and sparkling wine.
name: Absolut Watermelon

description: Made with six carefully chosen botanicals, Adnams Distilled Gin is elegant and approachable. Classically charged with juniper and rich with floral and citrus notes, it’s a warm and welcoming introduction to Adnams gin. Serve with muddled lime, ice and tonic water.
name: Adnams Copper House Distilled Gin

description: Warninks Advocaat has been made in Holland since 1616 and was one of the original producers of advocaat. Advocaat is a traditional liqueur made from egg yolks, brandy, sugar and vanilla. Warninks Advocaat is full bodied with a sweet and creamy texture and aromas of vanilla. It is a classic brand that is enjoyed in many cocktails as well as neat or on the rocks.
name: Advocaat Warninks

description: Nose Meaty, with fragrant maple sweetness and salted caramel, big chipotle spices, tangy cheese, a strong medicinal note, hint of leather. Taste Refreshing menthol, intense dark chocolate, sweet BBQ smoke. FinishCloying mint, hints of liquorice and anise, lingering charcoal and ash, caramel boiled sweets.
name: Aerolite Lyndsay

description: Launched in 1997, After Shock is the original taste sensation. Each flavour has its own unique dual hot and cold taste sensation.
name: After Shock Blue

description: Launched in 1997, After Shock is the original taste sensation. Each flavour has its own unique dual hot and cold taste sensation.
name: After Shock Red

description: Agwa De Bolivia is the only coca liqueur in the world. Created from Bolivian coca leaves and mixed with 37 other herbs and botanicals including guarana and ginseng this versatile premium herbal liqueur can be enjoyed straight, as a long drink or in cocktails.
name: Agwa

description: Altos Plata is versatile and can be enjoyed neat or as a Margarita. An aromatic and fruity tequila, Altos Plata is sweet in the mouth, with citric notes of lime and lemon and cooked agave. The aftertaste is well balanced, pleasant and long lasting.
name: Altos Plata

description: Altos Reposado is versatile and can be enjoyed neat or as a Margarita. Altos Reposado has a sweet sensation in the mouth, some tannins and citrus. The body is robust, yet pleasant and it has a long finish with a well-balanced combination of sweetness from cooked agave, vanilla and woody flavours.
name: Altos Reposado

description: A sublime blend of premium rums with all-natural toasted coconut and pure, sustainably sourced coconut water. Lower in sugar, Aluna Coconut is the perfect choice for a new generation looking for better drinks and, vibrant flavours. Light and floral, with toasted coconut, fresh banana, vanilla pod and cocoa.
name: Aluna Coconut Rum

description: Double distilled and oak matured for two years, the matured spirit is blended with the finest, freshest cream to make a rich, soft and stable cream liqueur.
name: Amarula

description: None
name: AMASS Riverine

description: Angels Peach Schnapps
name: Angels Peach Schnapps

description: Angostura 1824 Limited Reserve is a blend of the finest mature rums, hand-picked by the master blender from select casks. These rums are aged in charred American oak bourbon barrels for a minimum of 12 years and then skillfully hand-blended and re-casked. Upon the rum's optimum maturity it is hand-drawn, filtered and hand bottled.
name: Angostura 1824

description: A marvelous añejo made from a blend of light and heavy molasses based rums aged for a minimum of 8 years in charred American oak bourbon barrels. Beautifully soft, revealing a generous and long-lasting array of toasty flavours as a result of long ageing in charred barrels.
name: Angostura 1919

description: A golden rum from Trinidad aged for 5 or more years in American bourbon barrels. It presents chocolate, spice, vanilla and toasted oak flavours and provides a remarkably warm and mellow finish. It can be enjoyed neat as a sipping rum or over ice, however its deep character lends to being mixed with stronger mixes, spices and herbs.
name: Angostura 5 Year Old

description: A unique blend of natural herbs and spices, Angostura Bitters is used in drips and dashes in cocktails, and in cooking as a flavour enhancer.
name: Angostura Bitters

description: A unique blend of natural herbs and spices, Angostura Orange Bitters is used in drips and dashes in cocktails, and in cooking as a flavour enhancer.
name: Angostura Orange Bitters

description: This powerful, robust and flavourful rum is a blend of light, medium and heavy rums distilled in Angostura’s continuous still at different intensities and matured in once–used oak casks for a minimum of seven years. Mouth watering flavours include maple, chocolate, honey and toffee and presents a rich full-bodied taste that tapers off in to the classic rum finish.
name: Angostura Reserva 7 Year Old

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Antica Flavours range available in variety of flavours to suit all tastes.
name: Antica Apple Sambuca

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Antica Flavours range available in variety of flavours to suit all tastes.
name: Antica Banana Sambuca

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Antica Flavours range available in variety of flavours to suit all tastes.
name: Antica Black Sambuca

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Antica Flavours range available in variety of flavours to suit all tastes.
name: Antica Cherry Sambuca

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Mixing the star anise distillate with essential oils, fine spirits and the purest white sugar gives the product a pleasant anise aroma.
name: Antica Classic Sambuca

description: Dating back to 1786, Antica Formula is arguably the first - and finest of all red Vermouth recipes. With a bold, yet rich sweet structure, delivering a truly exquisite complexity to a classic Manhattan. It is classic, unique and unmistakable. With Vermouth in the midst of a spirited revival, Antica Formula is the Italian Vermouth par excellence.
name: Antica Formula

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Antica Flavours range available in variety of flavours to suit all tastes.
name: Antica Green Chilli Sambuca

description: The steam distillation of star anise fruits together with an infusion of sweet orange, coriander, iris, Turkish rose and many other herbs form the basis of Antica Sambuca. Antica Flavours range available in variety of flavours to suit all tastes.
name: Antica Raspberry Sambuca

description: Aperol is light in alcohol at only 11% ABV but has a rich and complex taste derived from the infusion of a blend of high-quality herbs and roots. The original recipe has remained unchanged and is a secret to this day. To make the perfect Aperol Spritz take a large wine glass, fill with ice and add 3 parts Prosecco, 2 parts Aperol and a splash of soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.
name: Aperol Aperitivo

description: Appleton Estate 12YO Rare Casks Jamaica Rum is a true expression of our Master Blender's craft and passion. The rare, golden rums that make up Rare Casks are hand-selected, and have all been aged for a minimum of 12 years. The long years of tropical ageing give it its rich mahogany hue, confident woody character, and smooth robust taste - all of which make a bold statement of extraordinary quality. To be drunk Neat
name: Appleton Estate 12 Year Old Rare Casks Jamaica Rum

description: APPLETON
name: Appleton Estate 8 Year Old Reserve Casks

description: Appleton Estate Signature Jamaica Rum is a full-bodied, medium-sweet rum. It's a delicious blend of 15 aged golden rums with a warm honey colour, a lush, fruity aroma, and a rich taste. Cocktail suggestion Daiquiri
name: Appleton Estate Signature Jamaica Rum

description: AquaRiva Agave Syrup AquaRiva® Organic Agave Syrup is low GI, gluten free, suitable for diabetics and a healthy natural alternative to sugar as it is only fructose. Voted BEST Blue Weber Agave Syrup / nectar by Spirits Business Magazine.
name: Aqua Riva Agave Syrup
